RJ stepped back and saw that the trashcan nearby was as tall as himself. "Okay," muttered RJ. "I think I'll just walk. It's not like being late will..." RJ tried to pick up his briefcase but for some reason it seemed that the briefcase was too heavy for him. RJ looked up and saw Dominique getting off her motorcycle. However, she seemed surprisingly bigger and was laughing down at him. "Looks like humans are even more puny than I heard. Especially with the right spell." RJ saw that he was actually shrinking and at a rapid rate.

He tried to run but as he kept getting smaller and smaller, Dominique was able to follow him by calmly and slowly walking after him and then stopped, knocking RJ to the ground. RJ tumbled on the sidewalk and as he got up, he gasped because one of Dominique's camel toes was right behind him and it was the size of a bus. From RJ's perspective, he had been shrunken to 1/2 an inch tall. Dominique was 11'. She was a veritable colossus.

Before RJ could even think about the situation, Dominique plucked him between her fingers and brought him in front of her house sized grinning teeth right as she gave a sinister laugh. "You and me are going for a ride." With that, the giant camel biker chick proceeded to drop the tiny human...
1143.title: Queen-Sized Camel

115.content:
RJ was right out the door and made his way down the exit. He looked at his watch and gasped. "Oh my," he said. "My watch stopped. This is bad. If I'm late, my boss is gonna eat me alive. Possibly literally."

RJ held onto his briefcase and started to run towards TCG. He couldn't blow it. This was his first major project and he wasn't going to blow it. Along the way, he had to move fast as several anthros were turning around. He definitely didn't want to catch the attention of somebody who would probably want to eat him alive.

As he was rushing, he bumped into somebody somebody big. RJ rubbed his head and clung to his briefcase but then he looked up and saw he was looking at three huge anthro girls. None of which looked the same species.

But what kind of anthros were right in front of him?
115.title: Could a Trio Mean Trouble

1151.content:
RJ took a look at the three shadows and saw that he was looking at three obese anthro amazons that were looking down on him. The anthro in the center whose belly RJ bumped into was an Asian looking blue sea lion woman with thunderous thighs and light blue hair worn in a style similar to Sailor Mercury. She was even wearing a similar outfit that looked like it came straight out of an anime.

To the left of the sea lion girl was a red skinned anthro who had the upper body and udder of an obese goat girl with long blonde hair and a hair of sunglasses along with a biker shirt and a tank top. But the goat girl had gills on her neck and gray scales on her legs that made it look like she was wearing pants but with fins at the side. She was a capricorn.

The girl at the right of the sea lion girl was a green skinned alligator snapping turtle girl with red hair worn with a bun and ponytail and she looked like she was wearing a yellow martial artist's belt as she looked down at RJ. All three of the girls were exactly 12' tall.

"Well look what we have here," said the capricorn girl in an Greek accent. "A human." The snapping turtle girl lowered her head and RJ inched back out of fear of her massive jaws. But he wound up bumping his head into something else that was big and soft. he looked up to see a large an obese jaguar girl with bright golden yellow fur and reddish blonde hair worn in a ponytail with a purple bow. She was also wearing a pair of cargo pants with a shirt bearing the Thundercats logo.

RJ looked up in fear but then the jaguar girl lifted him in the air to inspect him and spotted his briefcase before smiling. "You going our way?" she asked. RJ was surprised. "You work for Tooth and Claw Gaming?" you ask. "We start work today," said the jaguar girl. "My name's Selena." RJ shook hands with Selena before she put him on the ground. "I'm RJ." The capricorn bent over, placing her udder on RJ's head as she gave a smug smile and looked down. "Don't forget it," she said. "But I'm Hera." The sea lion girl looked nervous and shy but forced herself to smile. "My name's Ami and this is April." Ami pointed to the snapping turtle girl who smiled, though her jaws made her more intimidating.

"It's dangerous for humans to be alone in this neck of town," said Selena with a grin. "Some anthro might leave you as bones on the street." RJ shivered at that thought. "Don't scare him!" yelled Selena. "RJ, I think you better carpool with us. It would be safer that way." RJ smiled and nodded his head.

The car they took belonged to Selena and she was the driver as April sat in the front seat. RJ found himself in the back sandwiched between Ami and Hera's massive thighs. The sea lion girl was blushing as she looked down on the tiny human being pressed against her hip. The capricorn on the other hand was lighting herself a cigarette. RJ looked around and saw that the girls were as beautiful as they were big-bodied. Selena was a cat girl which was always a plus and she was the friendliest of the girls. Ami was shy but cute. Hera was a more hardy type but that didn't do anything against her sex appeal and even the intimidating April had an exotic touch to her, ignoring her monstrous teeth.

But RJ realized something. "Do any of you eat humans?" he asked. Selena gasped. "Don't even say that." She said. April made a face as if she was gagging and Ami shook her head. "No, never. "I quit," said Hera as she puffed on her cigarette. "They don't sit well inside me." RJ breathed out a sigh of relief.

As the quartet parked the car and got out and as RJ walked into the building, he decided that he would ask one of them out for Friday Night, but which one?

RJ gulped when he remembered that his rent was due. It wasn't that he couldn't pay it, it was the fact he had to deal with Zelda. The obese lioness wasn't exactly fond of him. She didn't seem to hate him but he had dropped a couple hints that if the chips were down she'd eat him. Since then, RJ didn't really like being around her, always afraid she'd just make up an excuse to eat him right then and there.

Sadly, this was one of those times, he had to meet with her or she'd eat him anyway. With a LOT of reluctance, the young human made his way from his apartment to Zelda's room.
12.title: Pay his rent to Zelda for the month...

121.content:
RJ took a deep breath before knocking on Zelda's door. He had this month's rent in an envelope, all he needed was to hand it off in person and be he'd be safe for another month. He had considered just sending it to her, but the risk of her lying and saying it never arrived was a good possibility.

The door swung opened swiftly and RJ was eye level with a furry belly. Looking up passed two large breasts, Zelda's bloodshot eyes glared at him. Her only clothing was her bra and panties, plus an open bathrobe. While she always seemed upset around him, today was...different. Like she was more tired than anything else.

"What could you possibly want?" she asked.
"I...brought you the rent. It's due today..." he reminded her. He held up the envelope up to show he actually had it. She didn't remember? This is the first time she hasn't brought up the rent around him. The only two things she ever talks about is either the rent or eating him.
"Oh...right..." she says as she took it out of his hand. Then lightly tossed it onto her table. Something was definitely wrong. First she forgot, then she didn't count it. Plus not even a single comment about eating him.
"Well...see you later."
"Wait!" he said. She glared even harder down on him.
"What is it now?"

While RJ certainly didn't like Zelda, or more accurately he was terrified by her, it couldn't hurt to be nice. If he could befriend the carnivore, then perhaps he could be a day or two late with rent without perishing in a sack of acid.

"Is something wrong? You seem a little out of it today." Zelda stared at him for a few seconds before letting out a heavy sigh.
"I must be a wreck if You're asking me that...Fine. I'll tell you." She motioned him into her room. RJ stepped inside Zelda's apartment for the very first time. He's been in her office, but this was her actual room. It was surprisingly cozy. He took a seat in an over sized love seat while Zelda sat across from him. He felt like a child around all the large furniture, meant for the much larger lion woman.

"Like you guessed, there is something out. As much as I hate to say it...maybe you can help me out with it. In fact, you're probably the ONLY one that can help." Okay...no pressure there...
"What is it? I don't now how much help I can be, but if it's something I can do-"
"Listen. I'll be frank about this. Help me out this time, you won't have to pay for three months rent, and I won't eat you in during that time."
"Deal." RJ said it without even thinking. The biggest threat in the apartment building out of his hair for three months? Whatever she needed, this will be worth it. For the first time since he saw her, Zelda smiled. Her shoulder slumped, like a large weight was dropped.

"Good. Ah, that's a relief. Call your work, you'll need the day off. Tomorrow too. We'll need to spend today going over what you need to do."
"Sure, but...what exactly is it I'll be doing?" Zelda looked away and huffed.
"I'll need you to be my..."
121.title: Grr

1212.content:
"...my fake boyfriend while my mother comes to visits."

RJ's brows shot up into his hairline at that. "Really?"

Zelda nodded, giving a sigh. "Yeah, my mom is always nagging me to get a man every time she comes by. Typical mother stuff, wanting to see her daughter get married, raise a family, yada yada yada. I'm an adult but she treats me like a cub. I'm thinking if I have a 'boyfriend' that comes by she'll get off my back a little and give me some room to breath."

"Is it really that bad?" RJ just couldn't imagine what it was like to have a mother like that. His own had her moments, but she really never pushed him to do things. She always said that what he did with his life was his business and that she'd raised him well enough to make his own choices.

Zelda gave another nod. "Oh yeah. Shoot, if she had it her way, I'd be married and twice her size from eating all her cooking."

"Wow." What could RJ say to that? He didn't want to imagine Zelda even bigger. Then what she said hit him. "Wait, you said 'twice her size'?"

Instead of replying, Zelda pulled out a picture from seemingly nowhere and handed it to him. RJ's eyes widened without him even realizing it. Zelda's mom was frickin' HUGE. The picture showed Zelda and another lioness at least four times her size! Zelda's mother had reddish brown fur with long black hair that was tied together towards the tip. Her eyes were the same brown of Zelda's.

The lioness anthro had a belly that dwarfed her daughter's entire body with a large pair of breasts settling on top of it. Those were really the only part of her that could be called fat, however. The rest of her was toned muscle. Strong legs and arms with clearly defined muscles and tight buttocks. Her face was even devoid of fat, proud and almost youthful with only a few lines under her eyes to denote her age. Overall, RJ could say that Zelda's mother was one of the largest anthros he'd ever seen and probably in the best shape. Heck, even her gargantuan gut was a tight wrecking ball instead of a mountain of flab like her daughter.

"Damn..." He honestly couldn't help it.

"I know. I hardly believe myself and she raised me." Zelda agreed. "I swear she could have tried out for the ASL but didn't want to. Big mama Haley had other ideas."

RJ nodded, giving the picture back to Zelda. "So what's she like? Anything to watch out for."

"Confident and playful. Like to tease. Real proud of her size but always looking to get bigger. She's a bit domineering but only because she wants to look out for everyone. She feels like she's got to be everyone's pillar of support. Someone they can count on. She just goes a bit too far." Zelda rubbed her chin in thought. "The only time I've ever seen her angry was this time when I was little that this elephant gal tried to pick on me. Mom nearly tore her apart and threatened to serve her family up a dinner if she even looked at me funny."

RJ gave a low whistle. "Man, she's protective!"

"Yep but that's the only time I can remember even seeing her mad. So, you really don't have to worry too much."

"When is she coming?"

"She should be here tomorrow evening will be staying for about a week. Nothing too crazy. What could happen?"

RJ felt an ominous feeling at that...

The world fell out from RJ in that exact moment. He suddenly felt cold, like his blood had become ice in his veins. The feeling was made only worse by Haley's serious but neutral stare. It was like she was carved out of stone.

The young man gave a shuddering breath, suddenly aware of the rapid beating of his heart, before he answered. "Y-Yeah...I suck at lying. Never really it done too often."

Haley stared at him for the longest time and RJ couldn't tell what she was thinking. That was at least before the immense lioness let out an angry bark.

Long wavy black hair runs down to the small of her back, and her face is equipped with a short pair of tusks, a trunk, and a pair of bright green eyes. The elephant's immense bulk is just barely contained by a simple black tank top and jeans, but it's clear that the clothes are a size or two too small for her; RJ idly wonders if she might burst out of them if she breathes in too much.

"RJ, this is Ivory. She's going to be your roommate, which means she's also gonna be chipping in for your rent. However, if you end up in her gut, I'm not responsible for it." Zelda summarizes, ignoring RJ's paling face at that last comment. "Now go head off, I've got shit to do. Unless, of course, you want to be fat on my tits..."
RJ frantically scrambles out of the room before the lioness can finish her sentence; with a shrug, Ivory follows him.

The two reach RJ's - now technically their - apartment without much incident. When they enter, however...
1221.title: Ivory - A 15' tall Elephant Anthro

12212.content:
RJ couldn't believe this. When he woke up it seemed like this would be just another normal day, but now he had a roommate forced on him. And not just any roommate but a total stranger. Was this even allowed in his lease? He hadn't argued with Zelda because he was afraid of being eaten, but now that he was alone with this massive elephant, he wished he'd asked more questions.

His apartment was small by anthro standards, which meant it was more than big enough for RJ. It was only when he invited Sabrina over that he realized how puny his home must seem from an anthro's perspective. Ivory was even bigger than his wolf friend, her girth taking up a third of the living room on her own.

"So, um," RJ said awkwardly. "This is the living room. Sorry about the mess, I didn't know I was getting a roomie today." He smiled but Ivory's face was expressionless. RJ coughed awkwardly. "So, kitchen's over there, bathroom's there and... huh. I just remembered we only have the one bedroom... I wonder if Zelda remembers that... Well, the couch is a pull-out so you can use that for now--"

"I'll take the bed," Ivory grunted.

"But the bed's mine--" The elephant looked at him and something in her eyes made him zip it. "I mean sure, my room's your room! Literally, I guess? I'll take the pull-out for now. So... um... I'm not sure what else you need to know."

All of a sudden, there was a large rumbling sound. RJ startled and looked around for the noise when he realized it was coming from the colossal gut of the elephant woman. She traced one finger over her stomach and looked at RJ. The look sent shivers up his spine.

"Hungry?"

"Starving," she grunted.

"Well, the kitchen's fully stocked. I went food shopping yesterday. Feel free to help yourself."

"Don't have to tell me twice."

Before RJ could move Ivory's tusk lashed out and roped around him like a lasso, tying him up and lifting him off his feet.

"What are you doing?!"

"Helping myself," she said as she positioned him over her gaping mouth.

"But we're supposed to be roommates!"

The elephant shrugged. "I prefer my privacy. And I make more than enough on my salary to afford rent on my own. I don't need you. Besides, you heard Zelda. She doesn't care one way or another if I eat you."

"But-but-but-wait!"

Ivory paid him no mind as she stuffed him feet-first into her mouth. Her tongue greedily lapped at his legs, tickling his skin. She gave off an "mmmm" of satisfaction at his taste. RJ fought against the trunk, but it was wrapped tight around him like a boa constrictor. He pleaded but Ivory gave no sign that she heard him.

"Ivory! Don't do this! Please! We can work something out! We can--"

GLUCK

Ivory worked RJ's kicking feet to the back of her mouth and swallowed. Her trunk released him and RJ gave off a frightened yipe as he was pulled completely into her mouth. Darkness was all around him. His legs were halfway down her throat. He tried to use his newly free hands to pull himself out, but her esophagus was stronger than his entire body. No matter how much he strained, he wasn't going anywhere. He sputtered as Ivory ran her tongue up and down his face. Sucking the last few drops of flavor from his body was the only reason why she hadn't sent the rest of him down her gullet already. He needed to think of something fast! He threw his dignity away like it was nothing.

"I'LL BE YOUR SLAVE FOREVER!"

RJ cringed, waiting for the second swallow that would spell his doom, but it didn't come. The elephant's tongue went still.

"Schlave?" she asked, her voice booming in his ears, slurping on her drool. "Wha do oo een, schlave?"

RJ saw a chance and he took it. "Slave, yes! Spare me and I'll do whatever you want! I'll cook for you, I'll clean for you, I'll cater to you on hand-and-foot. I'll live to serve you, just don't eat me!"

Ivory paused in thought. A human slave. The idea did have a certain appeal. Much more than the idea of a human roommate at any rate. On the other hand, judging by how messy the apartment was, he might not be much use for cleaning. And Zelda did have a maid to clean the apartments for the residents... Though, she was a skunk. The rooms may look clean afterwards but they certainly didn't smell good. What to do? Ivory sucked on her human treat for a minute as she thought, meanwhile RJ spent the entire time whimpering and praying.

"A'righ," Ivory slurped. "I've mayd uph mah mind. You will be my..."
12212.title: Elephant in the Room

choices: Sabrina stops by for a visit
Ivory forces RJ to serve her undisturbed
122121.content:
RJ didn't make out her last word, he just felt a terrible suction around him. He was convinced he was about to go flailing down Ivory's throat but instead he was sucked up into her trunk and shot out the end like a loogie. RJ splatted on the ground and shuddered at the feeling of elephant snot covering him.

"Ew ew ew ew ew ew ew!"

"Knock it off," Ivory said. "I didn't spare you to listen to you whine. I'm doing you a favor by not eating you, but it's never too late for me to change my mind." She emphasized her point by smacking her belly. "Understand?"

"Yes!" RJ squeaked.

"Good. Now clean yourself up and do it fast. I'm still hungry and you're gonna take care of that. Either by cooking me a meal or being one. Oh, and before I forget, hand over your cell phone and your computer. I don't want you getting any ideas on calling for help."

RJ reluctantly handed over his phone and pointed out his computer on the living room table. Then he scurried to the bathroom and began washing all the spit and snot off his body. All the time he wondered, how was he going to get out of this? Back when he was seconds away from being swallowed, a lifetime of servitude seemed like a small price to pay for his life, but now that he was back in the outside world, he didn't have a clue of what he'd gotten himself into.

"I'm waiting!" Ivory yelled from the next room. RJ left the bathroom. For a second his eyes shot to the door. Ivory was sitting on the couch, using his laptop. She didn't even look at him but she said. "Don't even think about it. Just remember that I'm faster than you think. And I can be a Grade-A Bitch when someone makes me mad."

RJ grimaced. He decided to take her word for it. He went to the kitchen and began cooking a breakfast big enough for a hungry elephant. RJ heard Ivory typing away at his laptop, wondering what she was doing on it. Maybe it'd be smart to talk to her? After all, if they could be friends, he might be able to talk her out of this whole slave situation.

"So," RJ asked as casually as possible, "what do you do for a living?"

"Video game reviewer."

"Really? Cool! I work for Tooth & Claw Gaming."

"Their games suck."

"Uh... well I just handle computer security..."

"Not any more you don't," Ivory said. "Remember, you work for me, and I work from home. You'll be sticking around here doing whatever I ask. Speaking of which, that food better be ready soon."

Seems Ivory isn't the type to make friends easily. RJ decided to just keep quiet and focus on making her breakfast. RJ piled the food on several plates and carried them to the living room.

"Is that it?" Ivory demanded, sounding unimpressed. RJ's heart fell. Ivory scoffed. "Whatever. It'll do for now. But you better get your act together for lunch. In the mean time, clean this place up. It's a sty."

Ivory grabbed fistfuls of food and shoveled them into her mouth. To think, if he didn't play his cards right, he'd be joining that breakfast. RJ gulped and began cleaning up his messy apartment. It looked like he couldn't get out of this on his own. He needed help. Sabrina was the first person he thought of who could save him. She was always so protective of him. Whenever he was late to work and didn't call in, she usually checked up on him during her lunch break. If she saw what was going on, she'd help for sure! Maybe she'd even let him crash at her place until he could find somewhere less dangerous to live.

"Stop your lollygagging! As soon as this living room's cleaned up, you'll be giving me a foot massage." Ivory kicked off her shoes, exposing her elephantine feet. RJ shuddered. He could smell them from across the room. He begged Sabrina would check up on him.

Does she?
122121.title: Slave

choices: Ivory wants a belly rub, now
Ivory uncrosses RJ's legs to see a throbbing erection
1221212.content:
“Who’s Sabrina?” Ivory scrolled down RJ’s phone on his list of messages noticed a lot of them were between him and someone called Sabrina. RJ looked up from collecting the bits of trash around the living room at the towering elephant and gave an audible gulp of anxiety. He was really banking on the Albino Wolf to save him from this newfound hellhole, but now that she knew about her…

“Uh, well, she’s an albino wolf who leads the graphic design department at Tooth & Claw. She's...really nice, and imaginative. She’s a great friend who always has my b-”.

“How big is she?” Ivory interrupted him as she began deleting contacts besides Sabrina’s from RJ’s phone, starting with names that sounded like family to his workplace. She grabbed a another fistful of food from the relatively small breakfast her new Human slave made and gave out a deep belch. “Well?”

“Uh…” RJ grimaced, not liking where Ivory was going with this. “She’s...about eight feet tall. I don’t know how much she weighs, but I guess you could just call her fat.”

“Call her.” Ivory ordered, tossing the phone to RJ lazily. The human scurried to catch the black mirror and immediately called Sabrina. This was great! The stone colored Elephant was leading his salvation straight to him! Soon, this morning will just be seen as a distant and brief nightmare. “Put it on speakerphone.” The pachyderm ordered again. The slave was puzzled by this, but obliged, not wanting to incur her wrath.

*BZZZT*...*BZZZT*...*CLICK*

“Hey RJ, how ya’ doin’?” A cheery voice greeted RJ as Sabrina picked up. “Did you remember to pay Zelda, today? I don’t like all those comments she makes about you, ya’ know.”

“H-hey there, Sabrin-na.” RJ stuttered, failing miserably to conceal the anxiety in his voice, while Ivory rolled her eyes. “I was wondering if you uh...we-wanted to come over for a visit.”

“RJ, Is something wrong? You sound like you’ve seen a ghost.” Sabrina detected her human friends fear and immediately tried to soothe him. “Did someone try to eat you?! I’ll give them a piece of mind if that’s what it is!”

“N-no, it’s not that Sabrina…” RJ looked up at Ivory, apathetic as ever and making a gesture with her pudgy hand to keep going. “I just uh...there's something really important I have to talk to you about. It’s...It’s about us.”

There was a short silence after that, before RJ and Ivory could hear rapid, deep breathing on the other end. “Oh. Uh...Sure RJ! I’ll be there in a couple minutes!” With that, there was an audible deadline sound as the Phone Call ended. RJ let out a sign, hating that he had to emotionally manipulate his best friend like that. Not that he had much of a choice anyways, but still.

“So...why do did you call her here?” RJ tapped his fingers together as he began to collect the trash in the room again, not wanting to appear lazy to Ivory. Sure, he was about to get as far away from this sociopath as possible, but a lot of things can happen in a couple of minutes. “Did...you want to talk to her about video games or…?”

“Keep cleaning all this shit up.” Ivory ordered one last time as she exited the Living Room into her new bedroom, RJ’s old bedroom, slamming the door behind her. The human let out a nervous shrug and continued to tidy up his...her apartment. Something didn't feel right about this, the human felt it at the bottom of his gut that something really bad was about to happen. He repressed these feelings and kept trying to be optimistic, time seeming to slow down as he waited for the Albino Wolf in agony.

After five minutes, RJ had successfully cleaned up a good portion of his old living room. He sighed and wiped his brow of sweat, impressed of the amount of work he had done in such a short amount of time. He just wished that the prospect of digesting and being turned into Elephantine blubber wasn't the main factor motivating him. Suddenly, he heard a series of knocks on the front door.

“Hey RJ, I-I’m here!” Sabrina opened the door and let herself in. She let out an impressed whistle, noting how clean the living room looked. “Wow, Don’t you think it’s a little early for spring cleaning buddy, what’s gotten into you?”

Before RJ could let out a single peep from his mouth, Ivory barreled through the bedroom door into the living room, catching him and Sabrina off by surprise. “W-woah! Who the hell are-?!” The fifteen foot tall elephant didn't allow the albino wolf to finish her sentence as she grabbed the smaller anthro by her waist and wrapped her trunk around her neck. “Uh, RJ, what’s going on?!” Those were the last cohesively sounding words RJ heard from his best friend as Ivory lifted her up from the ground and plunged her head into her mouth.

“No...nonononono!” RJ began to sob as he understood what was unfolding before him. “No, you can’t eat her, Ivory, you can't! She’s my only friend, spit her out!” The human rushed up to Ivory as began to pound on her exposed feet, his punches and kicks only amounting to a pleasant foot massage for her. “Please...please you can’t!”

Ivory couldn't care less about what her slave wanted. All she cared about was getting a proper breakfast in her system and getting rid of a liability in one fell swoop. She felt RJ wail and force all of his strength onto her feet, giving her the foot massage she asked for earlier. ‘Hmmm...emotionally abusing him makes him do his jobs faster...good to know.’ The elephant pondered as she effortlessly move more of Sabrina into her gaping, slimy maw.

“You monster, I hate you!” RJ bawled, failing to take the chance with running away through the now open door in his emotional state. He collapsed to the floor, spending the last of his energy railing onto the pungent feet of his new mistress. This was his life now. He was going to be a slave for Ivory until the day he died.

Meanwhile, Sabrina was watching her life flash before her eyes. Wet, gooey slime coated her face and lubed her down Ivory’s slick, wide throat to her inevitable destination. RJ watched in horror as his friend's shoulders slid past the elephant’s blunt teeth and lips. Still hungry from that pathetic excuse of a breakfast her new slave made, she slid her draping jaws over the albino wolf’s chest as she kicked at nothing an beated her fists into her fat breasts and stomach.

Ivory opened her mouth wider than both RJ and Sabrina could imagine and chomped down on her heavyset waist, further gulping her down as she was soon nothing but a pair of flailing legs sticking out of her lips, shouting in peril as she was pushed closer to her inevitable demise. The sounds the elephant made as she swallowed his friend made the human shiver in disgust, opening her mouth wide again with a big contented sigh before pushing the albino wolf further and chomping down on her chubby legs.

RJ could only sit they're on the floor of his old apartment living room, traumatized as more of his best and only friend since he came to the anthro world disappear before his eyes. He wanted to help, his friends final scream making him feel obligated to, though he knew he would suffer the same fate if he did. He watched Ivory’s blubbery neck bulge with her body as she slid slickly down her gullet.

Ivory lifted the albino wolf’s flailing lower section over he head as she felt her body curl into a fetal position in the digested remains of her meager breakfast. She continued to chug down with more and more powerful gulps, Sabrina now reduced to just wiggling her feet before the stone pachyderm claimed her fully in the name of her appetite. RJ stared at the bulge Sabrina’s feet made as it disappeared into her chest, the massive stomach wobbling like a provoked waterbed as it bulges with it’s new occupant. The human looked at her now even bigger gut as it hung closer to the ground, the fat and muscle masking any sort of movement behind it’s dark, rubbery textured flab.

“Oomph...ya’ got any more friends, slave?”

“Mmmh~, I should’ve kept some of those contacts on your phone, I could still go for more.” R.J watches up in disgust with both Ivory and himself as he feels his member against his will stiffen from just gazing at the heap of flab and flesh his only friend in the Anthro world was in. You would be less than a snack If I ate you, but this…” She wipes away a tear rolling down RJ’s cheek with her dexterous trunk. “...brings me eternal joy. So, lets have some ‘fun’, shall we?”

Inside the office is a... surprisingly human sized anthro. A golden furred fox anthro to be exact, with two large... tails. She was physically fit looking and practically flat chested. She wore a loose fitting kimono which stretched down to the floor and had a hole for her previously mentioned tails, though underneath she appeared to be wearing more casual clothing, suggesting the kimono was more for making a good first impression than anything else. She bowed to RJ as he entered. "Konnichiwa... I mean... Hello." she said, "My name is Gorudo Misuto, it's nice to meet you. Y-You can just call me Misuto though, Gorudo is my family name."

Well, she was clearly foreign.

"Umm... I'm RJ, I guess we're roommates... It's uh... nice to meet you too." He bowed back.

"Good to see you two get along..." Zelda said, pointing back toward the hall. "Why don't you help Misuto move into your apartment RJ?"

1223.title: Foxy Ladies

choices: RJ shows her the house, and where she'll sleep.
Skip the house tour and the wait, meal's here. What happens?
12231.content:
After a short walk, RJ and Misuto arrived at his door. As RJ set the luggage down gently, and fumbled with the keys, he heard a low, guttural noise, almost like a growl. Looking for the source of the noise, he noticed the foreign vixen cover her mouth with one of the kimono's long sleeves, embarrassed. With a cough, she turned her gaze away from his.

"Oh!... ahem... you hungry, Misuto?" upon seeing her affirmative response, RJ chuckled, fitting the key into his door. "It's alright, I can order some takeout if you want, I'm not much of a cook anyways. Want some japanese noodles?"

"I-I do not mean to impose, it is true I am your roommate, but I can pay for my half." she replied, pouting. Something in the back of RJ's mind found her expression to be... cute. Seeing this golden-furred fox of a woman, clad in a traditional piece of clothing, pouting and speaking with a slight accent was kinda cute. It reminded him of those japanese anime shows, he mused to himself. "...besides, I do not think you would be able to pay for my meal."

Cocking his eyebrow, RJ gaver her a confused stare. Was she that big of an eater? The Japanese noodle shop near Furdale Towers was not that expensive, either. With a shrug, he gestured to her with his head pointing at the now-opened door, and picked the luggage back up. With a polite (if somewhat frantic) nod, Misuto entered the premises, followed by the room's original tenant.

"Thank you very much, RJ. Miss Zelda said you were a bit troublesome, but I guess she was just exaggerating." like a refined lady, she sat herself gently on the old loveseat RJ had in the living room. Oddly enough, the old piece of furniture creaked as she sat, as if she was really heavy, creating something of a tense moment in the room. Coughing again and covering her muzzle with the kimono's sleeve, she turned away, as if finding the paintings on the wall to be interesting works of art. With another shrug, you head to the telephone and look through the contact notebook.

"It's okay, that couch is pretty old, don't worry about it." is what he said. In his head though, he pondered about the times he sat on it and it had never given so much of a creak. Having found the noodle shop's number, he started dialing the digits, and soon enough, the voice of a polite senior was speaking on his ear. "Hello? 'Afternoon, Mr. Sato. Yeah, I'd like to place an order, just the usual soup with noodles, corn, and pork. Yes of course, no wasabi. Hang on, I have someone else here with an order, I'll pass to her." and with that, he handed the phone to Misuto, who took it with an eager look on her face. Saying something that sounded like 'moshi moshi', she began speaking in Japanese, seemingly happy at hearing someone communicating in her native language. After a few minutes of her describing her order, she finished, and handed RJ the phone back. "Hello? Oh, eh... she's a new roommate the landlady arranged for me to share the room with. Yeah, I'll... what. She ordered THAT much? I... fine, I mean, I'm in no rush... really? But I... alright, thanks. See you."

RJ put the phone back in its base, and regarded his roomie with a dumbfounded expression, and the vixen, wagging her tails from side to side, smiled. "I told you, you wouldn't be able to pay for all of that. So, for your help carrying my luggage here, the meal's on me today." RJ had no words. He just scratched his head, and sighed. "He also said the order would be delivered here in twenty minutes, so, until then... do you happen to have....s-some snacks? I'm still a bit hungry." Still looking at her warily, he nodded and gestured for her to follow.

"Might as well give you the tour of the place. Come on, I have some chips in the pantry." and with that, she got back up and followed him, tails wagging.

An hour or so later, RJ was suddenly startled awake by some cold water splashing on him. Sputtering he opened his eyes. "W-What the he-" He stopped short as he discovered he was no longer on the couch. In fact, wherever he was, it was damp, extremely cramped, warm, and moving.
