Getting out, RJ heads to where you left your clothes after cleaning them and gets dressed. Thankfully for him it was the weekend and he approaches the door.
1243112112.title: Butt I don't want to go there!

124311212.content:
"Aaaaaand done! Alright, shift's over." Maya said cheerfully once she'd finished cleaning the last room. RJ felt relieved. She'd promised to let him go once she was done work and she'd wrapped up just in time too. Her stomach acids were tingling worse than ever. He decided to stop struggling to avoid making her mad now that escape was in sight.

"You can let out in my room," RJ said nervously. "Don't worry about the mess, I'll clean it myself."

Maya giggled. "Oh, how generous. I'll get right on that."

RJ didn't like the way she said that but gave her the benefit of the doubt and waited patiently for the anthro to chuck him up. He sloshed around inside her as she walked, hopefully back to his apartment, but when she finally came to a stop in a room, she made no move to let him out. Unknown to RJ, Maya had returned to her own apartment. Inside she stretched then laid on her back on the couch.

"Home sweet home," Maya sighed happily, running a finger over her grumbling belly.

"Uh, Maya, I don't think I last much longer in here. May you please let me out like you promised?"

The sound RJ heard next chilled his blood. Maya was laughing.

"Let you out? I can't believe you fell for that!" she laughed loudly. "As a human living in an anthro apartment building, I knew your survival instincts were awful, but I never actually expected you to think I'd let you out after eating you!"

"WHAT?!" RJ yelped.

"You're food, dummy. I don't eat food only to throw it back up. Zelda's the boss and she said I could do anything I want with you, and what I want is for you to digest. I'm honestly surprised you've lasted this long. Whatever. It won't be long now."

"LET ME OUT!" RJ screamed.

He kicked and punched with renewed vigor against the confines of his fleshy prison, but his efforts were just as useless now as they'd been before. Maya giggled, her meal's struggles tickling her again. Just like last time, gas built up from RJ's struggles, only this time they didn't come out as burps.

Pffffffffrrrrrrrrt!

Maya wasn't really embarrassed about this. She was a skunk after all. She lazed on the couch, watching TV as RJ cried and pleaded for help inside her. She just turned up the volume so she wouldn't have to hear him. His continued struggles kept her gassy but the internal massage he gave her more than made up for a few foul smells. The full, fun feeling of her meal made her doze off.

When Maya next woke up, she found her stomach still.

"RJ? You still alive in there?"

Burbles from her stomach was her only response. Maya smiled and patted her stomach. It was then she noticed what time it was and realized she'd overslept!

"Crap!" she yelled. She didn't bother washing or changing clothes, she just booked it to Zelda's office to report it. Zelda wasn't happy with her, but when Maya explained what had happened to RJ, the lioness laughed and decided to let her off the hook with a warning.

Maya went back to work, only this time it was much less fun than yesterday when she'd had company throughout her shift. In fact, she had a bit of a stomachache. While RJ may have been dead, he still existed in the gas he gave his devourer. Throughout the day, when no one was around, Maya would let off a fart and sigh in relief.

Eventually she came to RJ's apartment where Maya met with the wolf as she was looking for her friend. Maya liked her and ended up feeling bad when she lied to her over her friend's disappearance.

"Hey, Maya... you haven't seen my friend around, have you? He's a human named RJ. He didn't come home last night and I'm getting kind of worried."

"Sorry, haven't seen him," Maya lied. "But I'm sure he'll turn up eventually."

"Yeah... you're probably right... Alright, see you later."

Maya went inside RJ's apartment and got to cleaning. She decided to do a half-assed job. After all, it's not like the apartment's occupant would ever appreciate her work. By the time she got around to RJ's bedroom, her stomach was hurting again and more gas was building up. With a grunt, she let loose. The fart that followed was earth-shattering.

PPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!

It sounded like a miniature explosion and reeked worse than anything Maya had ever smelled before. Even she couldn't help but blush in embarrassment despite no one being around. She wafted a hand in front of her nose.

"Jeez, RJ, you stink worse than I do... Guess I did what you asked, though. I did let you out in your room."

Maya laughed as she packed up her cleaning supplies and left the room. No one else ever did move into RJ's old apartment, no matter how cheaply Zelda priced it. For some reason, despite all the cleaners Zelda hired, no one was ever able to get the foul smell out of the bedroom.
124311212.title: Maya was Lying

choices: They run into someone else on the way.
12432.content:
The skunk maid showed nothing but concern on her face. "Oh no! I'm so sorry! Are you alright?" she said in a sweet girlish voice.

RJ shook his head. "Uh...no I'm fine. Sorry for bumping into you." Maya shook her head "Oh no. I should have watched where I was going. I'm Maya....um...well you can see that for yourself obviously..." she said pointing to her name tag.

Being fairly certain he wasn't about to be fumigated, RJ relaxed. "I guess we're both sorry. RJ. Nice to meet you." They shook hands. "Zelda mentioned you. She didn't seem to happy about it though...." she said. "Yeah...well...it's complicated....but as long as I pay the rent......" RJ's eyes went wide "Oh no! I'm supposed to pay the rent! I'll be late now! She'll kill me....maybe litereally."

Maya's eyes went wide "Oh no! It's my fault for bumping into you. Here. Let me go with you and explain it to Zelda." she gestured. "I'll lead the way. Just follow me." RJ wasn't sure what to say but the skunk seemed insistant. "Ok sure."

He followed behind Maya, on the way to Zelda's office. Trying not to stare at her rear. It was rather large and shapely, though he couldn't tell if she was on the plump side or if it was just her maid outfit making her look that way. And he certainly wasn't going to ask.

But Maya's figure was the least of his problems. If they couldn't explain the situation properly or if Zelda just didn't care he'd likely be lunch.
12432.title: Friendly Maid.

choices: Zelda, does in fact, respond poorly
124321.content:
Upon arrival, Maya held the door to Zelda's office open for RJ, following him in afterwards. RJ thanked whatever gods were on his side that they'd managed to at least make it there without any further incidents.

"You're late on your rent-" Zelda began, but was interrupted by Maya beginning to apologize profusely.

"I'm sorry ma'am! It's my fault, I bumped into RJ in the hall and accidentally kept him from arriving on time." She began bowing repeatedly as she continued. "Please, don't be upset with him, it's my fault!"

The lioness blinked in confusion, looking between Maya and RJ. Taking his chance, RJ quietly put his rent payment on her desk. Zelda quietly took it and counted through the cash to make sure it was all there, though she seemed... distracted. After a moment she spoke up.

"As I was saying, you're late on your rent RJ, but you got lucky today. I've got bigger fish to fry than you, and I'm in a good enough mood that I actually would prefer not to show up with lunch still squirming inside me." She chuckles darkly and shakes her head. "However..."

RJ gulped, fully expecting to get chewed out, possibly literally. "However?"

"However, I still am going to note you were late on your payment today. That's strike one RJ, best hope if you even need a strike two that you catch me in a good mood again."

RJ groaned, but Maya stepped forward slamming her hands on the desk, and, due to her position, practically sticking her ass in RJ's face. "Now hold on! It wasn't RJ's fault, don't hold this against him!"

Zelda raised an eyebrow and RJ's jaw dropped. He'd never seen someone take a stance against Zelda directly like this, and to be frank, Maya was easily a good foot and a half shorter than the lioness.

"Look, I understand you need your rent to make ends meet and run the business, but give him a break, he's trying his best!"

Zelda maintained a poker face as Maya finished her speech, and RJ couldn't get a read on her reaction. He just hoped she didn't react poorly.
124321.title: The Legend of Zelda's Mood

choices: Go for it, Maya seems nice enough
No way, he just met Maya, he can't live with her!
1243211.content:
Zelda paused for a while.

"Alright, RJ, I won't count it as late."

RJ's heart lept at hearing that...

"On one condition..."

and promptly plummeted.

"RJ, your apartment has room for two tenets, correct?"

He peeked around Maya cautiously. "Uh... Well, yes, it does but-" Before he could continue, Zelda put up a finger to tell him to stop.

"No buts. Maya, if memory serves you're looking for a new place..."

RJ groaned again, he could see where this is going.

"So, since you two are apparently already getting along so well, I'll give you both an offer." The lioness folded her hands, smirking and leaning forward, her tail flicking playfully behind her. "RJ, you get to keep your record spot-free, if you let Maya be your new flat-mate. Plus Maya, this would be convenient for you, you don't have to travel anywhere near as far to get to work, and you can keep your uniform in your apartment when you aren't on the job. So... What'll it be? Take the strike, or live in the same apartment?"

RJ gulped, looking back and forth between Maya and Zelda before making up his mind.
1243211.title: An Offer You Can Refuse

12432111.content:
Live...with Maya? That was not at all what he figured would be the result of this! But....it could be worse, he supposed.

RJ weighed the pros and cons. Sure he barely knew the girl, and living with a girl could bring up all kinds of trouble. But on the other hand Maya seemed to like him well enough and wasn't likely to try to eat him. Heck since she was a bit smaller than most of them she might not even be able to even if she wanted to.

"Well I guess that can work." RJ finally said. Before catching himself. What about Maya? She might not exactly want to live with him. And as the only human around he got enough abuse as it was, let alone dragging her into the mix.

"Er...if that's ok with you Maya. Might not be the safest place. I get trouble for being the only human here, and I'd hate for you to get dragged into it. Could be dangerous." RJ said.

He looked to her for her response.
12432111.title: He's ok with it if she is.

choices: RJ at home getting ready for tour
124321111.content:
For what seemed like an eternity to both of them, even though it was only a few seconds, Maya was in deep though.

"Living with a human Maya thought. She then looked over at RJ and wondered how the two of them would get along as roommates. "I mean he seems like a nice guy and...well...kinda cute too." Maya averted her eyes from RJ with a barely visible blush on her face. Did she really just call him cute? Maya, however, quickly recovered and thought back to the topic at hand.

"I don't really have another option." she continued, while she was able to afford her current apartment,her time there has been nothing but stress, anger, and misery. Her apartment complex was 45 minute drive away, and she her shift started at 7 am so he had to wake up incredibly early to get herself ready and drive to here on time. She didn't really have any friends since it was in a very bad neighborhood of Furdale the other tenants in her apartment building were sketchy and weren't really the nicest people to be around. But worst of all was her landlord Samson, and how much of a cruel and perverted man he is. Maya was filled with anger and disgust at the thought of that man. The son of a bitch obese sow, was incredibly strict and had one of the shortest tempers Maya had ever seen. In a similar situation to RJ she was late by an hour to pay her rent for the month because she overslept and he screamed and yelled at her for 30 minutes straight, nearly reducing her to tears. The man was also always eye her up whenever they were together, he would constantly try to hit on her, would get mad when she rejected him, and would make remarks about her somewhat chubby and pear shaped body saying "All fat women are as ugly as sin, you really need to lose that weight if your ever gonna have your lease reinstated." However all of those things would be unable to hold a candle to this next event.It was one of the worst days on her life came 2 months ago when she went to deliver another payment to him. As she entered his office and he popped out of the closet beside her and gave her a smack on her butt, Maya was completely caught off guard, she screamed and accidentally released her noxious gas on Samson which sent him into a coughing fit. After Maya realized what happened she tried to apologize to him, he smacked her in the face so hard she fell to the ground leaving her left eye closed and cheek swollen. He began to scream at her again and almost evicted her right there on the spot, however, after Maya cried and pleaded for him to give her another chance, he decided to not evict her under one condition. Samson then told her that if she wanted to stay she had to pay for his dry cleaning, and would agree to have her rent increased by $200 dollars for the last two months. She agreed since she didn't have any other place to go, however he revealed the last condition after she had accepted, which was her having to strip to her underwear, and preform a lap dance for him as well as give him a blowjob. She looked at him horrified and was about to protest, but when she that rage filled glare from his eye, she knew he wasn't going to take no for answer. With tears about to break out she stripped out of her clothes and pleasured him until he was fully satisfied. Once she was finally allowed to leave she raced back to her apartment and started sobbing uncontrollably in her bed. It was incredibly hard for Maya to even think about that day much less talk about it with someone. She felt tears brimming again when she looked back over at RJ again, it was then she realized that she had her way out of this hell.

The more Maya thought about it the more it seemed like a blessing in disguise. Sure she barely knew RJ at all, but living in his apartment complex had a lot of benefits. First of all she wouldn't have to drive to work everyday as mentioned before by Zelda. Secondly she'll be out of the terrible neighborhood and wouldn't have to worry about getting robbed, rapped or even killed there. Thirdly she'll be able to meet new people who will most likely be a lot nicer here then back at her place, Fourthly she'll most likely make a friend in RJ seeing as they're going to be roommates,and he seems like a relatively nice guy. And finally she'll be away from that awful man Samson. She thought back to how RJ mentioned about how she would most likely become involved with some of the issues he goes through being a human here in Furdale. They both seemed to against the world in there own special ways, and she was more then willing to have a companion to help her out and she would be willing to protect him if he was willing to take her in.

With no further thought need she lifted her head up with a determined look on her face and said to RJ, "I'm not afraid and I'll be more than happy to be your roommate." RJ, was slightly surprised she agreed but gave her a smile back and said. " And I'm glad I'll be yours too." Which caused Maya to look away with another this time more pronounced blush and smile on her face.

A loud whistle from in front of them brought both of them to the slightly annoyed face of the Lioness Zelda, who had secretly been hopping for her to decline. "Now that I have your two lovebirds attention, I have a contract which both of you have to sign which will allow her to become an official tenant, and your new roommate." RJ looked away and Maya blushed again at the love birds comment. They than walked over to Zelda's desk and took the contract from the table with Maya holding it in her hands while RJ was standing next to her.

It looked to be the same contract he signed but with an additional page at the end which was consent form they both had to sign in order to be roommates. RJ stepped back to allow her to read it, and after she was all finished she placed the contract back on the table, grabbed a pen and began filling in the blanks for her signature. As she bent down to sign she unintentionally gave RJ another view of her rather plump backside, he looked away and took a gaze out the window as the sky got brighter and the city was starting to wake up and come to life with more people and sounds coming from outside. RJ looked at his watch to and saw it was almost 7:30 and he had to get going soon for his job. He turned around to the desk and saw Maya had just finished and now he had to sign the last consent from. He quickly read through it and saw no glaring or outlandish rules or requirements and sign his name and handed the contract back to Zelda.

"Good,Make sure your moved in within the next 72 hours or the deal is off. Maya nodded her head "Yes Miss Zelda." she said. Zelda than turned her gaze to RJ, "You know human, you're very lucky you caught me in a good mood, and you had one of my employees stick up for you otherwise I might've devoured you on the spot." she said with a intimidating look which made RJ freeze up for a second before nodding his head as well. "Now since that's out of the way I can have you two get out of my office and I can fry that bigger fish I was talking about before." Zelda said as she shewed the two of them out the door, and closed it in there faces before they could say another word.

The two of them turned to look at each other with Maya being the first to speak realizing she might've changed his whole situation for the worse by having herself as now his new roommate she felt she needed to apologize to him, I'm so sorry for putting you in this situation, now your stuck with a fat,smelly, skunk as your new roommate." RJ was surprised by her sudden change in mood after it seemed like she was glad to be his new roommate and vice versa. " Maya there's no need to apologize for, if anything I should be saying thanks." Maya looked shocked as RJ continued. " It's thanks to you that I'm still here right now, Of I hadn't had you for helping me out and sticking up for me back there, my ass would've been lion food." She started feeling better and a smile was growing on her face once again. " Also I really don't think your fat at all, if anything I think your body looks great the way it is, and as far as smelly, (he smelled the air next to her) you don't smell bad at all, in fact you honestly smell really sweet almost like flowers and cinnamon." This got Maya to once again visibly blush and smile, it was the first time in her life she heard someone say that she wasn't' fat or smell and she could tell he was being genuine. "T-thank you." she replied shyly. "I make sure to out on a lot of perfume on in the morning to make sure I'm not a nuisance to anyone, also if your called stinky your whole life you learn how to smell nice, and be clean.Though saying that, it doesn't always work out perfectly." Maya continued on rather timidly "Since I was born with out a scent gland do to a genetic defect, my makes up for this loss by producing more and more gas than a normal person would when they eat something, which results in me occasionally having bad bouts of.....flatulence." Maya had an embarrassed look on her face again when she said that word. "Hey" RJ said causing Maya to look up again, " It's honestly not a big deal to me, I mean there will be some growing pains with us being new roommates that's to be expected, but if the thing your worried about is if I'm going to hate you for passing gas, you really don't need to be concerned it's something all of us do." Maya felt she was about to tear up again from the happiness that was over flowing through her, she grabbed RJ and picked him up in a big hug. "Oh thank you so much RJ." she said joy " You don't know how long I've been waiting to hear those words."

Unfortunately to break up at that romantic moment was RJ watch beeping, he had to leave for work now or he'll be late. He told Maya that he had to leave and she put him down. "If you want i can show you my place after I'm out of work." RJ said. Maya smiled "Sure." "Cool come at 7:30, room 119, bye Maya." "See ya RJ." she said
124321111.title: She's not afraid.

1243211111.content: Whose perspective do you want to see from: Maya's or RJ's?
1243211111.title: ______'s day

12432111112.content:
Heading out of a Mexican restaurant after leaving work, Maya returns to her apartment with a full belly. The ugly building was in a decayed state and the fact it was standing to hold people within was nothing short of a miracle. The people living there also had personalities that matched the building's appearance, with Maya scared that one day they will do something to her, especially the landlord. Taking at least five minutes to unlock her door, Maya enters her home and starts packing everything she owes, which wasn't much thanks to Samson raising the rent whenever he wanted. Tossing everything into her car, Maya was ready to go when she remembers that she nearly forgot about her toothbrush and returns back to get it. Back again in her apartment for the final time, she grabs her toothbrush and was ready to leave when her stomach gurgles. It wasn't gas, as the payload felt solid in her bowels, and an evil idea popped into the skunkess's head.

"Feels like I dropped 30 pounds out of me, though I didn't think I had that much in me," Maya said, giggling at the last part, as she locks the door.
"Well, well, well, well. If it ain't the girly!" A sickening voice sneers, Maya freezing up at the sound.
The voice belongs to Samson, a sadistically violent pig anthro, who owes the building Maya was living in. He was an obese creature and very slobbish, making him reek from his breath to his body. The dimwitted landlord would bully anybody he sees as easy prey, including Maya, and have them do tasks they wouldn't do normally or risk having to move out or live in hell. Samson had a few of his buddies behind him, as they followed him and in return, paid for almost nothing or didn't even have to pay.
"You been moving more actively, Maya," he says, his cronies chuckling as more people came out to see the sight.
"Maybe she's trying to get rid of her fatass!" Someone said, adding laughter as the skunk shrank more and more.
Maya's ass was huge and envy of other women, but thanks to Samson using it as a form of sexual harassment and insults, Maya tried to hide it whenever she can, though the results are far more harsher than before.
"What you going to do, cry?" Samson said, cornering Maya into the wall.
"Come on! Try something and I'll have your slutty ass out on the curb, you skank! He says using her cruel pet name he gave her.
Maya was cowering before the pig in fear and was ready to give into the pig's cruelty when he mentioned about kicking her out.
"Wait a minute! I don't have to deal with this bull! I'm leaving this dump of a building, so I don't have to fear this fat bastard!" Maya thought to herself, before standing up straight and glaring Samson into the eye, surprising the anthro.
"What's with that look, you skank?" He asks, though he was losing a bit of his bravo.
"Actually, I was going to find you by following your rancid breath, but since you're here, here's the keys, you fatass," Maya replies, giving him her apartment keys, shocking everyone.
"Excuse me?"
"You heard me, you disgusting slob, or maybe that filth on you is getting in the way of your ears, but then again, your lack of a brain, is certain to miss it, so I'll say it slowly. IIII'mmmm. Llleeeaaavvviiinnng. Tttthhhhiiisss. Ddddduuuummmppp," she answers slowly and in a mocking tone, as a dam inside of her starts breaking.
Maya then walks away from Samson, as he tries to understand what happened and by the time she reaches the end of the hall, the pig understood it, his face red while veins bulge out in anger.
"YOU BITCH! You think you can get away with this?" He asks, as he storms towards her, unaware of the gas bubble, cultivated by anger and Mexican food, was ready to be unleashed onto the cruel hog.
"You know you shouldn't come at a skunk from the behind, as we're notorious for our spray," she says as she turns her head to see him come into range and her butt explodes, with Samson at ground zero.
Maya's face melted into pleasure, as her fart lasted for a few minutes and the sound could be heard by a couple of buildings over. Samson immediately entered into a coughing fit and some of his followers fell from the intense smell. Once the fart ended, Maya turns to see Samson hacking out his lungs and everyone else either knocked out, coughing, or closing their doors. The dam finally bursts, rage from the pressure of the pig's bullying consumes Maya when she sees him in a weakened state and delivers a kick to the groin, felling the bully. Holding his crotch, Samson could only look up at the same skunkette he tormented over time, before another kick into his face throws him to the floor and soon a barrage of kicks hit him in the gut, but he couldn't do a thing about it, as there was too much it to cover.
"What's the matter, you fat fuck!? Gotten too greedy and aroggant, you stupid piggy bastard?" Maya swears, anger pouring out from the abuse while she continues to kick him until she gets tired and everyone else who was conscious was greatly scared of the bullied skunk. Hocking a logey at pained pig, Maya heads out of the door, before stopping right before it and a squeak comes out of her anus.
"Almost forgot: did a paintjob in my place, though it's not complete, and I also clogged the toilet. That's my present, from me to you, mothefucker."
As she left, she could hear cheering and applause from the other victims, plus some others as well.

Now outside of the building, next to her car, Maya pulls out her phone and calls her sister.
"Hey sis, it's me, Maya."
"..."
"Just moving out of that hellhole and into a better apartment. How's Anthro Sumo going for you?"
"..."
"It's where I work at and I'm sharing with a roommate, so the rent isn't that bad."
"..."
"He's surprising nice and cute for a human," Maya answers, blushing at the thought of RJ.
"..."
"You got one too by the name of Marc and you think he's the one. Oh, I think Samson is about to see the paintjob I did to the place. Left it a nice shade of brown," Maya said, spying Samson heading to her place from a window, her sister chuckling on the other end, then erupting into a boisterous laughter as Samson screamed so loud that the whole block could hear it.
"..."
"Just stuck around to see his reaction, so I'll be going now. Bye, Cindy, and see you soon," Maya said, ending the call, before heading over to her new home.

RJ was washing up when he heard the door open and when he came out, he saw it was his new roommate entering the building.
"Let me help you with that," he says, grabbing some of Maya's luggage.
"What a gentleman. So how's your day?"
"Busy, but okay. What about you?" The human asks, placing her bags into her new room.
"Perfect," she answers, a bright smile across her face.

What's next?
12432111112.title: Maya's victory

choices: Sabrina meets Maya in the morning
124321111122.content:
RJ and Maya hung out after eating until they were tired and went to bed. Entering her room she sees that everything was prepared for her, ready for her to move in.
"I know that he did this to save his ass, but still, he didn't have to go all the way for me to feel like it's home. The fact, he treats me almost the same as a human on his level, is kind of sweet," the skunk girl thought, getting mixed feelings for the human.
Switching into some pink PJs with hearts on, which defines her curves very well, she enters her bed, greatly noticing the difference between here and back at her old apartment.
"Definitely an upgrade to my living space!" She mentally says happily before sleep over comes her.

A window opening and something struggling to get in wakes both Maya and RJ up. Silently tiptoeing out of their rooms, RJ grabs a broom while Maya grabs a lamp.
"A lamp? That's a bargain I got it for!" He quietly chides her.
"If I use it, then I'll buy a new one for you," she whispers back, both people silently walking towards the source, ready to hit the intruder at first sight.
Nearing the room where they believe the source of the sound came from, RJ motions to his roommate to stay and crouches down before crawling into the room. Hearing some grumbling and someone insulting his accomplice, RJ pinpoints it before heading over to the light switch. With careful timing, he flips it on, the intruder surprised at the sudden change in brightness, before charging at his foe and bringing his broom down hard on him.
"Aaaahhhh!" A pig anthro screams in pain as he's stuck in RJ's window and struggles to get out of it.
"Sean, get me out here! Sean? Don't leave me here, you cowardly bitch," he shouts to his fleeing comrade, before facing the human in front of him.
Blood was flowing down his face, he stares down at RJ with hatred and growls in hopes RJ would free him from being scared of the fat pig before a shriek is heard behind the human.
"What are you doing here!?" Maya screams, the pig wickedly smiles at the skunkette.
"I came by to punish a certain skank for fucking up my place! Thanks to her, I lost some residents, meaning I lost money and someone has to pay! Ain't that right, skank!" He said, grinning while Maya shivers in fear before he continues.
"A weak, pathetic loser like you couldn't get away without any consequences and the fact that you're living with a human makes me sick! No sane anthro would d- Ack!" He manages to say before RJ hits him again.
"Says the fatass that tried to break into my home and I particularly dislike you insulting my roommate! Maya, seeing how you are well acquainted with him, can you go to room 201 for a Elisabeth and if she's not there, simply head over to Zelda while I call the police, okay?" He said, picking up the phone while Maya looks at him and nods her head before leaving.
RJ calls the cops after Maya left and grabs a book. Of course, Samson refused to stay quiet and was shouting occurities at the smaller being before the said being grabs an anthro apple (just another way to say a bigger apple) and stuffs deep in the pig's mouth. Had a normal person encountered Samson, they would have been terrified of him, but after dealing with Zelda's threats and Jasmine's bullying, RJ thought of him as a pushover in this situation, though he was irritated by the anthro's complaints. To pass time, he vocally read aloud on how to make multiple ham dishes until Maya returned.

"This better bbbbeeee good to wake me up in middle of the night or else I'm having a midnight snack," Zelda yawns, sleep in her eyes, while a hippo anthro stands beside her and Maya leads them to Samson.
Seeing the fat pig stuck in the window, Zelda immediately wakes up before bursting into laughter while the hippo glares daggers at him, who really started to sweat a lot.
"I couldn't find Elisabeth at her apartment, so informed Zelda about the situation, though she wasn't very happy about being woken up and we were about to head back when I bumped into Elisabeth
"I called the police already, but I was hoping you'll be around to make things easier. Sorry for popping this on you. I promise to pay you back for it eventually," he said, the hippo sighs before responding.
"Part of the job, though I kind have wished my job didn't follow home."
Meanwhile, Samson spits out the apple and something rude, judging from Zelda's reaction, as she pulls him out of the window and holds him over a foot off the ground in rage, claws out. Samson held his tongue for the rest of the night and soon it was Maya's turn to make a statement. The poor skunk couldn't say a thing, as sounds came from her mouth and she silently shivered when Samson sent his glaring eyes in her direction. However, RJ held her hand and gave her a look of confidence, making the skunk girl smile.
"Don't worry; he won't hurt you again, that I promise you!" Elisabeth said, adding more confidence to Maya.
Taking a breath, she soon told everyone what happened, plus the abuse she received over her time back at her old apartment, and she finished everything she had to say when the police arrived. At this point everyone was glaring at Samson with disgust as he paled other cops showed up at the door.
"Samson, you are under arrest for unlawful breaking and entering, sexual abuse, and embezzlement. Also, put a search warrant for him and his accomplice, Sean," the hippo said, as the other police cuffed him.
Zelda stayed around until the police left and returns back to bed. Elisabeth informs RJ and Maya to head over to police station say their victim statement before leaving. RJ cloes the door and sighs out in exhaustion before sliding down to the ground.
"So glad that's over! Thankfully, he was stuck in the window or else I would have been done for!"
"You were awfully brave back. Couldn't imagine you being scared," she said, the human shaking his head.
"Don't you remember me from when I was giving rent money to Zelda. I was scared shitless! Even that guy would have made mince meat of me, but luckily he was stupid and fat enough to get stuck. Well, off to bed," RJ said.
Getting up and walking back to his bed, a black and white tail stops him .
"Something the matter? Is it because of earlier?"
"Kind of. Is okay if we slept together?" She asks blushing.
He was baffled by her request and couldn't help but blush, as her body was quite... Good looking.
"I guess it's okay, despite the age we're at," he said, the last part he muttered as she drags him into her bed and falls asleep immediately, her heart conquered by the small human.
He would later regret it, as Maya sleep farts and thankfully he was too tired to care before sleeping himself.
124321111122.title: The window of opportunity... Is too small!

choices: RJ just kills time in his apartment before heading out
He decides to walk around Furdale for a bit
He goes and explore Furdale Towers
He gets an urgent call from Sabrina before noon
13.content:
That was right, Sabrina wanted to talk with him about something over lunch. RJ smiled at the thought. The rather plump wolfess was by far the nicest anthro he had had the pleasure of meeting since coming to Furdale. When he had first come to T&C Gaming she had smiled at him and congratulated him for getting the job. As one of T&C's lead graphic designers, she said it was reassuring that all their hard work would be protected and not go to waste.

That little moment had given RJ the confidence to really stick around Furdale. He didn't need everyone around him as long as he had at least a few who were nice to him.

The only issue now was what she wanted to talk with him about? They didn't work on the same team or project so it was rather curious. RJ shrugged, maybe she just wanted to talk. There wasn't anything wrong with that. Besides, Sabrina didn't seem like one of the maneater types anyway.

RJ looked at the clock again. It was 7:35 am. Sabrina didn't want to meet up until around noon. What to do in the mean time?
13.title: Go meet with Sabrina.

choices: It's Zelda...Oh no what does she want
131.content:
RJ decides to just kill sometime in his apartment. The last week or so has been relatively stressful for the young human. His workload at T&C had been high,especially with the release trailer of T&C's sequel to one of it's greatest masterpieces "Rings of Destiny" . Both hackers and rival companies were trying to get any information that they could to either play the game early or leak and spoil it's contents. So RJ was working like overtime to make sure the servers were perfectly secure and not on threat and to be honest he had a close call or two, though thankfully with it being the weekend someone else has his place until Monday.

He also had to pay his rent to Zelda on Wednesday and he nearly got himself eaten for almost being late to drop off his payment to the mammoth lioness, and nearly ended up as an experiment for Olivia the day after. With all that work RJ had somewhat neglected to clean his place up, mostly because he was too exhausted to once he got back.

He took a good look around his apartment, and noticed clothes on the ground, dirty dishes in the sink and a small layer of dust forming on the ground and some of the furniture. RJ being a little bit of a clean freak frowned at the site of his apartment thought to himself "Well I might as well get this place straightened out." After grabbing a couple of breakfast bars to, RJ spent the next 2 and half hours cleaning up all around his apartment, washing the dishes, doing his laundry, vacuuming the floors dusting furniture and even cleaning the windows. With a sigh, RJ plopped down on his couch and looked up at his clock. The time reading 10:12 AM he still had another hour and 45 minutes till his lunch with Sabrina. With nothing else to do RJ decided to watch a little TV, he scrolled through the channels clicking past the weather broadcast, the Furdale news which including discussion about laws for humans, the sports channel, With the announcers talking about last nights ASL(Anthro Sumo League's show). They showed a few highlights including a great picture of Claudine the giant Unicorn planting her fist right into the face of the slightly larger Amaya a phoenix Anthro. He kept going before stopping at the video gaming/nerd channel. RJ smiled, he was always a big nerd even in his younger days video games were a big part of him. The three figures on screen were humans and they were talking about some of the latest news in the gaming world, including the aforementioned "Rings of Destiny 2"

He continued watching for about an hour until he heard a knock on the door. RJ took another look at the clock 11:17 AM appeared before him, he wondered who it could be since he still had time before his lunch meet up, making his way over to the door RJ looked through his peep hole to see...
131.title: RJ just kills time in his apartment before head...

134.content: A few minutes later, your phone rings. Picking it up, you see that it's Sabrina calling. "What's up, Sabrina? It's not noon yet, but did something happen?" you ask, before you hear Sabrina's voice. Unlike it's usual chipper tone, her sounds scared, confused, desperate and sad. "RJ, thank god! I tried calling others, but I couldn't get to them. A problem occurred and it's <Blank>" "Alright let me get Anna and we'll be right over," you said as calmly as possible. What did Sabrina get herself into?
134.title: The call

135.content: A knock on your door brings your attention to it and you walk up to see who it was. Well, who was it?
135.title: Mystery guest

choices: Try Another Part of the Building
14.content:
RJ didn't have to go to work that day. He was told he wasn't needed that day, so he figured that the best idea would be to go to the upper floors and try to meet the neighbors he hadn't seen yet. From what he knew he was the only male in the buildings as well as the only human. He knew it was risky but it would be good to have some friends in this building with Olivia trying to study him and Jasmine out to get him.

RJ nodded his head and then walked out as he made his way to the stairs, stopping and hiding only briefly as he watched his landlady Zelda the lioness walk down the stairs. He could've sworn there was a human face shaped bulge on her large stomach. Perhaps Zelda was serious about her warnings.

Once the landlady was out of sight, RJ made his way up to the second floor and saw a row of several apartments. From what he heard, there were four anthro girls on this floor he knew about. It would only be fair to finally meet the neighbors given that he's been living there for a while now.

The first girl RJ knew about on this floor was Elisabeth, a 12' 11" hippopotamus anthro with dark tan skin and long black hair reaching down to her considerable rear. She was very obese but that was normal for her species. RJ had actually seen her before and recognized her because of her bright red jacket. He heard Elisabeth was friendly, but Zelda also told RJ that Elisabeth had a human boyfriend until she ate him for cheating on her. Not to mention Elisabeth was big enough to swallow two humans whole at once. Maybe she wasn't the best choice.

The second choice was Mako, an 8' 8" muscle bound shark anthro with long palish purple hair. Despite her name, Mako was a hammerhead shark. RJ heard that Mako was a conspiracy theorist and overheard the other tenants saying unflattering things about her. Perhaps there was more to her that met the eye. However, her species made you nervous.

The third anthro RJ heard of was the one next to nobody knows about. Her name was Uma and she was a 9' 2" unicorn anthro who was quite voluptuous. She had bright white fur and long blonde hair. However, little was known about her because she rarely interacted with the other tenants.

Finally, RJ had heard about was another one that the other tenants didn't think much about. Her name was Dorothy and she was an 8'5" cheetah anthro. She was an hourglass shaped body and always wore a lab coat. The other tenants saw Dorothy as a mad scientist and RJ heard she conducted strange experiments in her apartment. Maybe she wasn't the best idea to visit either.

So, which of his neighbors is RJ going to introduce himself to?
14.title: Meeting the Other Neighbors

choices: Elisabeth Leaves to go to work
141.content:
RJ nervously walked up to Elisabeth's apartment. The idea that the hippopotamus actually ate a human before and her boyfriend no less, terrified him. But was Zelda really serious? After all, hippos are generally herbivores. As RJ walked up to the door, he heard music playing. Elisabeth must've had the radio on.

RJ looked into the keyhole but he couldn't see anything. He quickly jumped back and shook. Elisabeth probably didn't like peeping toms. "Hello?" asked RJ. "Elisabeth! Are you in there? I'm RJ, your neighbor from the first floor! Hello!?" RJ didn't get a response. Then he started to think. He heard Zelda say that Elisabeth was a police detective. Zelda had to tell that to everybody in the apartment building to keep them in line. Maybe that meant Elisabeth was a reasonable anthro.

RJ knocked on the door again and waited before looking at his watch. But then he heard a loud stomping noise and felt tremors. Not surprising given the type of anthro there was behind the door. RJ then saw the door open and he looked at Elisabeth. She was a 12' 11" hippopotamus and had dark tan skin with long black hair. She was utterly massive. Her stomach was nearly as wide as she was tall, she had huge D-cup breasts and each of her butt cheeks had to be at least five feet wide with hips thicker than tree trunks. For clothing she was wearing her bright red jacket along with a gray shirt and tight blue jeans. RJ looked up in fear because he knew he was a toothpick in comparison to this massive anthro.

"You must be RJ," said Elisabeth with a smile, showing her sharp hippo teeth. "I've seen you a few times in the hall. Nice to meet you, I'm Elisabeth and that's Elisabeth with an 's'." Elisabeth smiled and then held out her hand and RJ nervously shook one of her flabby fingers. "Don't take this the wrong way Elisabeth," he said. "But.. I..." Elisabeth let out a chuckle. "You didn't expect me to be this big? Hello, I'm a hippo. Who ever heard of a small one of those." RJ smiled confidently.

She seemed friendly enough, perhaps Elisabeth could be a good friend. You'd need one in this apartment. But then RJ remembered something. "Uh, Elisabeth, Zelda told me you had a human boyfriend. Is that true." Elisabeth let out a snort. "I did," she said with venom in her voice. "But I caught the jerk cheating on me with a crocodile girl!?" RJ stepped back out of caution but then Elisabeth let out a sigh and smiled. "But I got my revenge on him. The first thing I did when I found out about the affair was to swallow him whole." RJ gasped as Elisabeth licked her fangs. "He was delicious. But don't worry. I only eat humans who have it coming."

So she did eat humans. Well, RJ realized he had to be very careful around Elisabeth. She may seem friendly, but she just confirmed she did eat her ex-boyfriend. RJ knew that if he made Elisabeth mad, he'd be going down her throat soon enough. So he decided to try and stay on her good side, all ten thousand pounds of it.
141.title: Enter Elisabeth

choices: RJ asks Elisabeth out on a Date
1411.content:
Elisabeth smiled at RJ, albeit it was an unnerving smile what with her huge hippopotamus teeth. RJ even stepped back as she bent to her level. "Why not come inside?" asked Elisabeth. "I'm not due to go in for a few hours." RJ simply smiled. "Sure," he said. "I have the day off after all."

As RJ walked in, he saw that Elisabeth's apartment was rather large. Made sense considering what type of anthro she was. RJ couldn't help but stare as Elisabeth's tail was shaking back and fourth on her monster sized booty. RJ looked around the apartment and saw that Elisabeth had quite an impressive sky garden at the side of her window and there was a shelf on the wall that depicted several glass creatures of myth, including a sphinx, a manticore and even a cockatrice. RJ then noticed a photograph on the shelf that appeared to depict Elisabeth on the beach with four other hippopotamus anthros that from the looks of it were her sisters. There was one blonde haired hippo woman wearing a pair of glasses and had gray skin. She was wearing a blue jacket. Next to her was an orange haired pink skinned hippo woman who appeared only slightly younger than Elisabeth and was wearing a yellow jacket. The last was a pale white skinned hippo girl with dark green hair and a green jacket.

"That's me and my sisters," said Elisabeth to RJ. "Cleopatra, Anastasia and Victoria." "Oh," said RJ. "I didn't know... uh, do they..." Elisabeth just smiles smugly before gesturing to RJ to join her for breakfast. Elisabeth then handed her human guest a plate stacked with pancakes. RJ saw that it was too tall for him to cut and Elisabeth put half of them on a second plate before she gave it to RJ. "Sorry," said Elisabeth as she ate several pancakes in one bite. "I forget that humans don't eat as much as anthros. Especially not hippos." RJ laughed and then started to eat his pancakes. As he did, he saw Elisabeth's mouth open wide and saw that she could very easily swallow him whole. Thankfully she said she normally doesn't eat humans.

"So, Elisabeth," said RJ. "I heard you were a cop from Zelda." Elisabeth smiled. "Most of my family is involved in rescue work. Cleopatra and Victoria work for the fire department while Anastasia is a nurse." RJ laughed as Elisabeth handed him some more pancakes. "But I'm curious as to know why there's a human in Furdale. Most humans in this city wind up in an anthro's belly within a week. What brings you here." "Well Elisabeth, I'm a programmer and a very good one. I was offered several jobs but took one at Tooth & Claw Gaming. Didn't think I'd wind up in an anthro town." Elisabeth lets out a laugh as RJ gets a good look at her. For a hippo, she was beautiful. That ex-boyfriend she digested must've been a complete idiot.

What happens now?
1411.title: Elisabeth's Invitation

14112.content:
"You know, Elisabeth," RJ said. "I'd like to get to know you better." Elisabeth wiped off her mouth before she looked at RJ in confusion. "What do you mean by that?" asked the 12' 11" hippopotamus police woman. "Well," RJ said embarrassingly. "I was thinking, maybe tomorrow night, if you're not busy." Elisabeth realized what RJ was saying and gasped before she smiled. "Are you asking me out?" she asked. RJ just gave a nervous laugh and Elisabeth smiled.

"I'd love to. How does four o'clock sound?" "S-Sounds great." Said RJ. RJ smiled. He actually had a date for tomorrow night. But then Elisabeth gave a grim look and showed her sharp teeth. "But you had better not stand me up, if you know what's good for you." RJ shivered and then smiled as the hippo smiled back at him. RJ knew better than to scorn a woman, especially a woman who had seven feet and several tons on him who could swallow him whole in a fit of rage.

The next day, RJ was getting dressed for the date in question and was on the phone with his friend Sabrina, the wolf girl from work. "Elisabeth?" asked Sabrina on the phone. "Elisabeth Richardson? Are you sure that's a good idea." RJ is applying some cologne on. "I know all about her last boyfriend. All I have to do is avoid cheating on her and I won't get to see what a hippopotamus looks like from the inside. I've been on dates before, Sabrina." At the other end, Sabrina was just getting ready to enter the shower. "Okay," she said. "Just be careful." RJ nodded his head and then walked out with a bouquet of jasmines (the flower, not the lizard woman).

RJ made his way back to Elisabeth's apartment and knocked on the door. "Just a minute." Said the hippopotamus woman inside the apartment. It wasn't long before the door opened and out walked Elisabeth. RJ looked up in surprise to see the tan-skinned hippopotamus beauty with her hair tied into a ponytail and bun and was wearing a yellow cocktail dress with gloves. While RJ is stammering he holds up the flowers. "Jasmines?" asks Elisabeth. "How thoughtful." With that, the hippo woman took the bouquet and ate it before smiling down at RJ. "Ready to paint the town red?" asked Elisabeth. RJ excitedly nodded his head and with that, they were off.

So What's First?
14112.title: Date with a Hippopotamus

choices: Uma answers the door with a timid smile. (She's shy!)
Uma answers the door with scowl. (Well, she's not happy)
Before Uma can open the door some else spots RJ...
143.content:
RJ took a moment to consider his options: Elisabeth seemed too extreme, if he made her angry she might eat him and that reminded him too much of Zelda. The rumors about Mako didn't fill him with any confidence and given her nature as a conspiracy theorist, there was every chance in the world she was paranoid. Dorothy's reputation gave off a similar vibe to Olivia and the less he had to deal with science gone wrong, the better. That left Uma, the unicorn.

She was the only one that didn't have anything bad said about, if only because she didn't really interact with anyone. That fact gave RJ some pause but he quickly reasoned that she just could be shy and liked her privacy.

His mind made up, RJ walked down the hallway towards Uma's room, he took in the fact of how large the hallway was. It was definitely made for large anthros with its towering ceiling and widely spaced walls.

RJ finally strode up to his destination: the door to Uma's apartment. Gathering up his courage by taking a deep breath, he gave the door a couple firm knocks.
143.title: The secretive Unicorn

choices: Uma's door opens, she might help!
1433.content:
"Well, well, well,what do we have here?" a voice slithered into RJ's ears.

The human gulped. He knew that voice and he turned to face it, hoping beyond all hope that wasn't who he thought it was.

He was disappointed. Staring at him in all her muscle bound glory was Jasmine. His relationship with said Jasmine was less than stellar. The woman just didn't seem to like RJ. In fact, she reminded RJ of the stereotypical bully he and probably everyone else in the world had to deal with a one point in their lives or another. Since she first met him, the reptile had tried to get a rise out of him. To this point, RJ had never even so much as snapped back for two major reasons: 1). he was afraid that Zelda might actually eat him for it and 2). he really think it was that big of a deal. Sadly, Jasmine disagreed with that last one.

'I completely forgot she lived on the second floor!' RJ mentally yelled at himself.

"Now what's a pipsqueak like you doing up here?" Jasmine leered down at him.

RJ stared back at her. "Just trying to get to know my neighbors." he answered honestly.

Jasmine gave a mocking laugh. "Ah, isn't that cute? The little geek's lonely!"

RJ didn't say anything this time and shrugged his shoulders at her.

The lizard amazon frowned slightly. "What, got nothing more to say?"

Again, he did not respond. Jasmine's frown turned into a scowl. No matter what she seemed to do, the pitiful little human just wasn't afraid of her.

Scowl still in place she began to walk forward toward RJ. Said human actually felt a bead of sweat roll down his face. Jasmine's harassment had always been verbal. But right now, she looked liked she wanted to upgrade that to physical. RJ's eyes darted across the hallway. He had nowhere to go and if the verifiable wall of black scaled muscle got her claws on him, he wouldn't be able to do anything.
1433.title: This was unexpected

choices: An experiment of hers goes haywire
144.content:
Gulping nervously, you were about to knock on the door when it open up, revealing a cheetah anthro.
"Hiya, RJ! Glad to meet the human brave enough to live in this crazy town. Come in; don't be shy. I won't bite," She says in a playful manner, you enter her home, as the door automatically shuts behind you.
It was basically what you can expect from a mad scientist's home: Pipes all over the walls and ceiling; glass orbs with electricity inside; and unknown devices on every table and countertop.
"Sit on the couch over there! Do you want tea, coffee, anything? I just gotta fix this gizmo here, before talking with you. Tintin will get you your drink for you and don't worry: I'm not into organics like Olivia is, so you'll fine," she rapidly says, giving you relief at she won't try to dissect you while a robot appears and a cover opens to reveal your drink.
Taking the drink, you thank the robot, as it returns your thanks and you wait as Dorothy finishes her task. Looking around, you see a desk with multiple computers showing several scenes, one that show off the front of her door. Huh, so that's how she knew you were there. With a zoom, she's back and sitting in her seat with a glass of water in hand.
"So what brings you over to my lovely home, Mr. Smith?"
"Going to ignore the fact you know my last name, but I'm here just to say hi," you answer honestly, though you're annoyed by her invasion of privacy.
"Ah, the old meet and greet! It's nice to meet your neighbors very once in a while and since I know a lot about you, I'll talk about myself. I'll be twenty-six this June and went Harvard for college, where I met Olivia. Designed several devices for different companies and built many more like this one," she explains, pulling out a gray box resembling a tissue box.
"Is that the Anthrentdo 64?!"
"The protype and mother of all Anthrentdo 64s! You can try if you want," she says, plugging it into her TV and turning it on.
"I'm the queen of nerds and as queen, I decree,you, RJ, to go to that cover and pull out a Cario 64!" Dorothy jokingly orders, you going along with it and much to your surprise, she has very game for very system created.
"Because I build stuff for video game companies, they send me stuff, as well as money for my reward. Pretty sweet, ain't it?" She explains, smug with herself.
Pulling out the game, both you and anthro played for hours until you guys finished it with 100% completion.
"That was fun, new game?" you ask, tired from the game.
144.title: The mad scientist

1441.content: Just before you could start, in stepped Olivia. Her eyes shot right to you and grew wide with excitement. "Perfect!" She exclaimed. "You're the perfect size for my latest test." She grabbed you and,
1441.title: Olivia comes in

1442.content:
Dorothy laughed, getting up to switch out the games. "Like you need to ask, my loyal subject," she said grandly, not dropping her 'Nerd Queen' bit. "Your Queen demands we play until our thumbs bleed--argh!" She suddenly flinched, paws going to her eyes before she could grab a new game.

R.J. got to his feet, worried. "Woah, you okay there?" He got closer, trying to ignore how he had to tilt his head up to see her face. WithDorothy's 8-foot height, he was at eye level with her ample chest.

Growling and cursing under her breath, Dorothy rubbed her eyes. "I'm fine. Just some eye-strain after playing video games for so long. Stupid to not take a break..." She blinked a few times; R.J. could see a red tinge to her yellow feline eyes.

He suddenly noticed his eyes hurt, too; they were even tearing up. They must have been playing that game for hours...his legs hurt from sitting so long, too.

"Okay, maybe that's enough video games for now...ouch!"

==One Eye-Wash Session Later==

After the ocular ordeal, the pair decided to shelve gaming for the moment. After VERY pointedly telling him not to touch anything, Dorothy had taken R.J. on a tour of her lab. It turned out the place wasn't as haphazardly set up as it looked: every boiling beaker and flickering screen was labeled, the more dangerous hardware...which was admittedly most of it...sectioned off and marked with warning signs.

R.J. had even started to see patterns in how everything was arranged--safer, less hazardous experiments were strewn around the kitchen and living room; more dangerous set-ups were walled off in special closets or, most ominously, Dorothy's bedroom. (THAT room was locked behind a steel bulkhead and needed a keycard; Dorothy said whatever she was working on within was "classified" and refused to include it in the tour. R.J. knew better than to pry about it.)


The tour eventually took them to a workbench tucked away against the living room's back wall. Taking up most of the station was a contraption resembling a scaled-down jet engine set on a swiveling mount--almost like it was meant to aim at a target. Its generator let out a low hum as if powered on, but the row of sceens nearby were showing steady, low readings. It was inactive, then.


"Ah, now THIS is a marvel!" Dorothy beamed, patting the barrel. "It can alter the atomic structure of its target; reducing the space between atoms but otherwise keeping it unchanged. Whatever it targets gets smaller and denser!"

R.J. had been fascinated listening to Dorothy describe the contraption, but suddenly something clicked. "Making it smaller and denser...wait; you mean it's a shrink ray?" He couldn't help laughing--it sounded ridiculous, even knowing Dorothy's reputation. "Pull the other one, Dorothy."

"That's what they told Jonas Salk, and he cured polio." Dorothy quipped, sounding a little offended.

R.J. put his hands up. "Woah, easy. Curing a disease is one thing. But zapping stuff with some beam and making it smaller--"

"And denser! I'm reducing the space between the target's atoms."

"--Smaller and denser with the push of a button? Come on, that's comic book stuff! I get it; you're playing up the 'mad scientist' bit to mess with me--"

Dorothy stamped her foot and gave a petulant snort. "Hmph! A skeptic, huh? Fine, time for a demonstration!" She produced an apple from somewhere and set it up against a target. Shoving past R.J. she activated the device and fiddled with the controls, taking aim at the apple---

Until the swivel mount sparked, the ray suddenly lurching and spinning erratically even as it charged up. Frantic, Dorothy pounded the controls--and got it to stop!

...Right when the ray was pointing at R.J.

It fired before she could kill the power, and R.J. was enveloped in bright light. He felt like he was falling....

===

R.J. didn't know how long it took to clear the spots from his vision. What he DID know was that he wished he hadn't, because now he found himself looking at a pair of gigantic cheetah feet.

"Goddamn it," he mumbled. Sighing, he looked up...to find Dorothy towering over him like a colossus, a worried but still smug look on her face. He could now see that she wore a bright red bikini under her lab coat. It hugged her hourglass curves quite nicely, and was so tight it looked like it was painted on.

Not a bad view, but it wasn't worth being small as an ant.

"Still skeptical?" Dorothy quipped, leaning down to smirk at the shrunken human.

R.J. took a step back. Some of the more vicious Anthros didn't have problems eating normal-sized humans; he'd barely be a snack right now. Dorothy hadn't hurt him, and this shrinking thing seemed to be an accident, but still...

"So, uh; what happens now?" he asked, trying to keep his tone light.

"Well, with your enhanced durability and strength, you're safer at that size than you think," Dorothy explained, squatting to get a better look at him. She giggled, "You're cuter now, too! Anyway, you're kinda like Ant-Man, minus controlling bugs--tiny but tough. And that gives me some ideas...!"


What does Dorothy do?

1.) For Science! - It turns out Dorothy has
some tests prepared to properly test a shrunken volunteer's enhanced durability and strength. R.J.'s available and shrunken, so why not "volunteer" HIM for her research? It might even help find a way to un-shrink him sooner.

2.) Unsanctioned Research - She COULD find a way to return R.J. to normal, or even just take notes...but Dorothy wants to "research" how fun playing with a shrunken human is--and she has plenty of "experiments" in mind!

3.) Scientific Ethics - Dorothy just wants to un-shrink R.J. ASAP for his own safety, putting any experiments aside.
1442.title: The Inevitable Lab Accident

choices: Drops R.J. on a chair and sits on him!
Makes him give her a foot massage!
14422.content:
Dorothy leaned onto her knees, getting on all fours to loom over R.J. "Oh yes; this is fascinating. A new frontier of science, even. How's it feel on the cutting edge, R.J.?" her voice had gone from perky to sultry, her smile to a fanged grin.

R.J. toppled onto his rear, staring up at the cheetah giantess. "I...I...Uh--"

Dorothy unbuttoned her lab coat, folding it neatly before settling it aside. Now, she was clad only in her tight red bikini. "Hmm, so many opportunities to learn. I won't even need my lab gear; this can be done with informal wear! Of course, I'll need an assistant for these next experiments!" Grinning even wider she reached out and grabbed R.J. in a fist, standing up as she held him close to her face. "Before you say anything: no, I did NOT plan on you being shrunk. That WAS an accident. To be honest, I hadn't even tested the ray on anything living yet! Just objects and plants. The apple wasn't even the first time I've demonstrated it!"

"B-but it just h-h-happens t-to shrink ME? How convenient," R.J. huffed. His bravado was hampered by his terrified shakes and stammers.

"Random chance can be fickle. It could just as easily have been me that ended up tiny. But, thankfully, it wasn't. Now, onto my first experiment in 'How Fun Is Playing With A Shrunken Person'! Human trials first, then an anthro subject!"


Grinning, Dorothy began her "research" and...

Elisabeth could swallow him whole if he managed to make her mad at him, Mako didn't sound too stable, Dorothy sounded like a mad scientist and he knew next to nothing about Uma. It was there he decided to try and go past the second floor and walked up to the staircase. As far as he knew, there were five floors in Furdale Towers. But which floor will he go to now?
