Check up on Anna. RJ owes Sabrina that much.
1451.content:
As he ascended up the stair, RJ did his best to remember about what he knew or had heard about the tenants of the third floor.

The first one he recalled was Naomi- a 10'7" cury cerberus who works as a exotic dancer. She has black fur and red hair. As a cerberus, Naomi has three heads, each with a different personality. Naomi's right head wears her hair long and curly. The right head was known for being quite nice and even somewhat shy. Naomi's middle head wore her hair in a long and low ponytail. The middle was friendly and level-headed. But it was Naomi's left head that most knew her for. The left wore her hair shoulder length in micro braids. The left head was not unfriendly but rather assertive and opinionated. The three heads seem to switch personalities at random unless the situation was serious enough. It's completely unknown is she likes to eat humans or not.

The next RJ recalled was, believe it or not, Sabrina's older sister: Anna- Anna was a 11'5" wolfess with grey fur and black hair. Where Sabrina was rather plump, Anna was straight up obese. She works as a manager of a supermarket the Garden. Intelligent but rather gruff, Anna tends o distance herself from others. Sabrina had even said she hadn't spoken with her sister in several months and asked if RJ could check up on her when he got some free time. Sabrina never mentioned if Anna ate humans but given that Sabrina never brought it up, she must be okay. Then again, Sabrina hadn't talked to her in months...
1451.title: Third Floor

14512.content: RJ walked up to what he thought was Anna's door and reached out to give it a few knocks...
14512.title: Seeing Anna

choices: "What do you want?" She's standoffish and a little hostile...
145121.content:
RJ knocked on the the door gently. On the other side he heard some shuffling before her heard foot steps approaching. No, more like he felt them. After step he heard gave off a noticeable vibration. RJ couldn't help but think: 'How big is she?'

In general, Anthros were larger than humans in height and sometimes in body mass, whether it be muscle or fat. The largest Anthros RJ had ever seen where Jasmine and Zelda, who while not the tallest were still up there in the height department and made up with it in body size. Jasmine was practically a wall of reptilian muscle and Zelda had a belly big enough to fit atleast three grown men comfortably. Sabrina was the smallest Anthro he knew and she still dwarfed him utterly and she had said that Anna made her look like a runt.

Despite all of that, none of it prepared RJ for the Anthro who opened the door. He felt his eyes bulge slightly at the sight of his friend's older sister.

In front of him was a veritable mountain of an Anthro covered in grey fur. She was tall, easily dwarfing RJ and her head only a couple of inches away fro,m the ceiling. Her hair was black and long enough to reach past her shoulders. Her face was puffy, more resembling a chipmunk with stuffed cheeks than a wolf. She wore a red shirt that look somewhat strained and could only cover he massive chest. Resting under that was a wrecking ball of a belly that poked, despite the fact Anna was still inside her apartment, several inches past the door frame. Her arms and thighs were likewise large and thick but held in undercurrent of muscle to. All in all, Anna dwarfed every other Anthro RJ had seen yet.

"Hi." He said awkwardly, his brain still not working properly.

Anna looked down at him before saying...
145121.title: Anna, Sabrina's BIG sister

choices: Risk getting closer to her first to see if she'll move away from the door
1451211.content:
"Well hey there..." She steps back, making room for RJ to step inside. Not wanting to offend, RJ stepped in immediately, Anna shutting the door behind him surprisingly gently."So... you live downstairs, right?"

RJ nodded. "Uh, yeah, my name's RJ, I work with your sister, Sabrina."

Anna suddenly grins toothily, bending down and offering RJ a handshake, which, again, not wanting to offend, he accepts. Her grip is tight, but not crushing.

"So you're the human Sabrina told me about. Hmmm..." She suddenly pulled RJ closer, giving him a testing sniff. "Heh, I guess you two haven't hit it off."

RJ blushed a bit, surprised at the forwardness of Sabrina's large sister. "H-Hit it off? We're just friends! A-And she asked me to check up on you."

Anna's tail began to wag, as she looked RJ over. "Just friends, huh? Well then..." She sits back, her mass completely covering the door RJ had come in through. "Why don't you stay awhile? We can have some fun and get to know each other." She pats her massive gut as she talks. "Course, if you need to be anywhere, you could also take a short trip through me to get out the door, if you want, I know I wouldn't mind."

RJ's pretty sure she isn't serious, though her wagging tail suggests she has something up her sleeve, he wasn't sure what to do.
1451211.title: A Visit with the Big Bad She-Wolf

choices: Anna let's him go and slams the door in his face
1451212.content:
RJ wilted a bit under the large wolfess' glare.

"Um," RJ started nervously. "I'm Sabrina's friend and she asked me to check up on you..."

Anna growled. "Do I look like I need to checking up on?"

"Well...no..." RJ muttered out and started to back away from the door, Anna's eyes never leaving him. "...I should go...sorry for troubling you..."
1451212.title: "What do you want?" She's standoffi...

choices: Anna begins to sniff him...it's something else...
14512122.content:
RJ went to turn around when Anna grabbed his arm!

The human looked back and up at the wolfess before gulping...

What did she want?
14512122.title: Anna grabs RJ! Oh no!

145121221.content:
RJ's eyes widened as a thunderous noise reached his ears. Anna's massive gut was giving off such powerful growls that it made her stomach vibrate visibly!

"Ya know," Anna started, "I haven't eaten anything all morning and you just walked up here..."

Anna's tongue snaked out to lick her lips and her face sported a growing grin.

"...and who am I to pass up a free meal?!"

RJ's face paled as he struggled to get free of the titanic wolf's grip but to no avail. Anna casually lifted him off the ground so that he was eye level with her. She opened her jaw revealing her gleaming white teeth, large pink tongue and the dark hole that represented her throat.

"No! Please, no!" RJ begged.
145121221.title: Her stomach growls...She's hungry!

choices: She slurps him up and ignores him
She listens to what he has to say
1451212211.content:
Anna ran her tongue across R.J.'s face and murred in pleasure, "Mmm... Such a delicious flavor... And no fat on ya either, you'll make a great snack."

"I'd make a better friend" R.J. Counter in a shaky voice.

"Ya know, I'd bet you're right.... But I'm not a betting person, there's always that chance that you're wrong" Anna replied. She the moved his head toward her mouth. R.J. Squirmed and wiggled in a last ditch effort to break her grip.

"Wait!" He shouted, "I have a request!" Anna paused and eyed him in a confused yet annoyed manner.

"Really now? A request?" She asked as she raised her eyebrow.

"Yes... If you're really gonna eat me, there has to be a much better way to do it than this, treat me like a proper meal. I should be eaten at a table with a side dish or at the very least a glass of water." R.J. Was hoping that if she agreed to his request, then he could buy time for Sabrina to show up and save him, or come up with a way out of this mess.

"Kid, look at me... I'm a wolf... Does it look like I care if I eat at a table? All that fancy shmancy stuff isn't for me" Anna scoffed as she continued to hold R.J. Level with her maw, giving him a view of her mouth and throat every time she spoke.

"Please. It's my last request, it's not like You don't get to eat me..."
1451212211.title: Anna gulps him down

choices: Anna Takes a Nap with RJ in her Belly
14512122111.content:
Anna's stomach let out a thunderous rumble as Anna grinned wickedly at RJ who was sweating in her grip. "Hear that little human?" she asked. "My stomach is getting impatient, which is why I'm going to eat you as you are." "P-Please don't! I'm a friend of Sabrina!" Anna let out an evil laugh as her mouth opened wide. "That didn't save the last few humans. Bottoms up!"

Anna shoved RJ into her mouth. It was big enough that his entire body fit inside. RJ tried to fight his way out but the morbidly obese wolf woman twirled her tongue in her mouth to assault RJ all over as he screamed. She laughed wickedly and threw her head back. RJ tried to hold onto Anna's tongue but her saliva was too thick and caused him to slip down her throat.

RJ landed with a splash in the stomach juices and surfaced, spitting up the juice and coughing. Outside, Anna patted her room filling belly and licked her fangs before letting out a thunderous belch. "Nothing more yummy than a human in the tummy."

Anna was so large and fat, RJ could stand up in her stomach and ran to the wall and pounded on it. "Please Anna! Throw me up! Let me out!" But his voice was muffled over the walls of Anna's bloated stomach and Anna smiled as she patted her big belly. "There's plenty of room for you to move around in there. One time I swallowed ten humans and they kept pounding until they were digested."

What happens now?
14512122111.title: Wolfed Down

choices: Anna snarls and pushes Sabrina back.
145121221111.content:
With RJ still pounding on her stomach walls, Anna went to sleep off her meal when a knock came from her door. With an annoyed sigh she went back to open the door. Opening it, she saw the smiling face of her younger sister.

"Hello, Anna!" Sabrina beamed up at her.

"Hey, there, sis." Anna spoke evenly.

"Have you met or seen my friend RJ?"

Anna was about to answer when a large bump jutted out from her titanic belly and causing Anna to burp loudly. Sabrina's smile and happy mood dropped in an instant and she her mouth dropped in horror and outrage.

"...you didn't?" She breathed out.

Anna shrugged nonchalantly.

"Spit. Him. Out. Now." Sabrina was actually baring her fangs at her larger sister.

Anna was a little taken aback at her little sister's reaction. In spite of her surprise, she spoke with an edge. "Now sis, don't do something we'll both regret. It's just one little human..."

No sooner had those words left Anna's mouth, that Sabrina had reached up and grabbed her shirt and with a violent jerk brought the mountain of a wolfess to eye level.

"His name is RJ!" Sabrina growled out. "He's my friend! And you ate him! Now spit him back up! NOW!"

Anna stared at her enraged sister blankly before responding.
145121221111.title: Sabrina Knocks on Anna's Door

choices: Anna asks for something rather reasonable...
Anna has something wicked in mind for the two...
1451212211111.content:
Anna sighed heavily. She really didn't want spit the human up but staring back into Sabrina's angry red eyes and realized that it wasn't worth it. The human wasn't that filling to begin with and she could tell that Sabrina would give her utter hell over this.'Besides', Anna thought, 'it's good to have someone in your debt.

"Fine." Anna said.

Sabrina was taken aback by that and let go of Anna's shirt.

"You'll let him go? Just like that?" Sabrina asked, suspicion clear.

"Oh, no." Anna smirked. "I do this for you and your little human, you both owe me a favor each."

Sabrina mulled it over, her every instinct telling her not to take this but her more emotional part of her mind overtaking it. RJ was sitting Anna's stomach because she asked him to check on Anna. This was her fault and she had to get him out no matter. It also didn't help that she had no other way to make Anna let RJ go.

"Okay. Deal." Sabrina grounded out.

Anna smiled at that before beginning the process of dredging her meal back up.

---(Several minutes of retching and vomiting later)---

RJ did his best to not stumble on the slick, thick fluids that covered him as he raised himself from the floor with Sabrina's help. Despite the fact that he had just traveled down an anthro's gullet and back and was now covered in mucus, he was alive and out. Sabrina's presence was also a reassuring detail as well.

"Are you okay?" Sabrina asked, concern written on her face.

"Been better." RJ muttered. "But I'm alive. That's something." He tried to lighten the mood a bit but that attempt failed when Anna took a step towards to two, drawing their attention.

The mountainous wolfess smirked at them. "Now, you two, I do believe you both owe me a favor..."
1451212211111.title: Anna does nothing for free

14512122111112.content: Does Anna have them do this wicked deed together or do separate tasks on their own?
14512122111112.title: Together or single

145121221111121.content:
"I have been bored for a long time, so something amusing you two will do for me is... hhhhhmmm...," Anna pondered, scratching her large ass. "So many ideas, so I think you will do is have your human to live in your stomach for one week straight. If you retch him up at any point, I'll eat him in your stead, got it?" "What?! That's basically the same thing as you did before! Why would you suggest that, and after he was eaten by you? And what about work? We both can't take the week off!" Sabrina responded expectedly. "Because you're both such good friends, it'll amusing to see one of them digest the other," Anna giggled wickedly. "When you start is no difference to me, you can eat whatever he needs: food, tech, etc. However, I have a limit to my patience, so be quick about it!" Anna added, before strolling into her bedroom to grab something.

         Turning to RJ now, Sabrina looks at you with sad eyes and said, "You don't have to go with this, I'm sure I can figure something out, give me time!" As much as RJ would like to avoid being eaten, looking at Sabrina's flabby gut, he wouldn't mind being eaten by a nice girl like her. Since she'll do everything to prevent him from digesting, of course. "Say, if I accepted, will you follow, even if you don't like it. Mind you, I prefer not to owe a debt to people with hostile attitudes, in addition," RJ asked. "If that's what you want, sure," the wolf answered back. Musing over his choices, RJ makes his decision and tells it to his big friend. "Made your decision, yet?" Anna question the duo, entering the room. Sabrina is the first to answer her older sibling. "Yes; we have made a decision, and it is....."
145121221111121.title: Out of the frying pan and into another

choices: Sabrina eats RJ slowly, so she doesn't hurt him.
Sabrina takes RJ in one massive gulp, like he asked.
Sabrina sees if she can't teach her big sister that lesson...
1451212211111211.content:
"...we'll do it. I'll eat RJ." Sabrina looked disgusted at having to say that.

Anna laughed. "See, I knew you would!"

RJ frowned at the larger wolfess. "Let's just get this over with, ok?"

Anna put up a hand. "Just wait one moment, I've got to get a camera for this." The titanic anthro turned around and hurried back to her bedroom.

RJ stared at Anna retreating backside for a second before turning to Sabrina, whose mouth had dropped open. The albino wolf clicked it shut when she noticed her friend staring.

Sabrina sighed. "I'm so sorry, RJ. I should never have asked you to meet Anna."

RJ walked up to his friend and gently took her hand, causing her to blush. "It's ok. It wasn't like you thought she ever do this on purpose. I don't hold any of this against." He smiled at her. "We'll figure something out."

Sabrina smiled at his reassurance but then frowned. "So how do you want to go down?"

RJ tilted his head in confusion. "What do you mean?"

Sabrina sighed again. "I mean, do me to take it slow or...God...I can't believe I'm asking this...or do you want me to eat you in one gulp. I think I could manage that."

"Well, I'd like to get this over with. However, you're the one whose got to eat me. I say you do whatever you need to."

Sabrina thought to herself for a second. "What I might need to do is something a little more drastic..."

"What do you mean?" RJ stared at his friend in confusion. "You're eating me. I think that counts drastic."

Sabrina's eyes glared at Anna's bedroom. "Let's just say, I think you're not the one who needs to get eat. I think my sisters needs a lesson or two."

RJ's brow furrowed. Is she saying, what I think she's saying? he wonder. But before he could have asked what exactly Sabrina meant but Anna came back in, camera in hand.

"Let's get this show on the road!" The elder wolfess said, excitement coating her voice.
1451212211111211.title: Out one, in the other

choices: Escape now, deal with the consequences later.
Wait it out. You don't seem to be in danger anyway.
145121221112.content:
RJ took a moment to try to calm down as he began to realize his efforts on the stomach walls were going to amount to a whole lot of nothing. Dejected he sat on his haunches, not even bothering to notice the stomach juices that were wicking up his pant legs and ruining his shoes. "Gotta think cool RJ. There's gotta be a way outta this."

Outside Anna rubbed her stomach in triumph as she felt the little human pace back and forth within her. The most delicious part of the experience was always the fear, and the total dominion she had over another person as they thought about their impending doom squirming in her guts. Sometimes they made it out alive though, and considering that Sabrina seemed to be fond of this one Anna found herself hoping that RJ was lucky.

As much as she wanted to just enjoy the sensation of RJ trying to escape from her fleshy prison there was the matter of the double shift she had just gotten home from and the amount of sleep she was missing. Reluctantly she turned around the corner to her bedroom and eased herself onto her massive mattress. The plump wolfess didn't have much time before she would have to be awake again and human meal or no she had to make the most of it. "Talk to you later, small stuff. If you're still kicking. Got a long shift at the warehouse later today, then I'very got a three day weekend. If you're still alive maybe I'll let you out in time for Friday." Teasingly she pushed in on her belly, feeling the small human with her hands through the gut flesh on her abdomen.

RJ screamed as his world was flipped 90 degrees and the expansive stomach he was residing in suddenly became a lot more cramped. Two bulges, roughly hand shaped and similar to the appendage that had put him in this situation gently caressed his body. For a moment he forgot where he was and just lay flabbergasted in the deceptively mild digestive soup while the hands rubbed him up and down. Muffled though it was he made out the possible promise of freedom if he survived, which gave him a little ammunition to use against his growing pessimism.

As a few more minutes rolled by however a more expedient and much less uncertain path to safety presented itself, in the form of Anna snoring. If she was deep enough into sleep perhaps RJ could escape now, crawling back up her throat and trying to get help from Sabrina.

But maybe if he just did as he was told and waited things out he could please Anna some way. Having such a big anthro on his side in this dangerous place was surely something that was worth the risk.
145121221112.title: Anna Takes a Nap

choices: RJ walks up to her door and knocks.

As RJ pondered between his choices, he suddenly remembered about yet another resident.

Her name was Jenna. Jenna was a kangaroo, stood at 8’4”, and was quite obese and bottom heavy. She had dark brown fur, with a light brown underbelly, as well as blonde hair that she usually kept in a ponytail. She had moved into Furdale Towers less than a month ago and not much is known about her other than she had recently graduated college, with a degree in computer programming, and was in search of a job. Other than that, RJ knows nothing about Jenna, whether she’s friendly like Sabrina or harsh like Zelda, as well as if she eats humans or not.

RJ pondered on this thought. She was job hunting and with her degree, she could be a great asset to Tooth & Claw Gaming. Then again, it’s unknown whether she eats humans....

RJ walked all the way to the fourth floor and was panting before he wiped his mouth. He then looked forward to see several doors down the hallway. The first two had anthro girls he had heard of.

The first one was an 8' tall sheep anthro named Bernadette. Bernadette was an obese sheep girl with long white wool over her body and always wore a pair of glasses. She was said to work as a librarian. Sabrina told you bad things about Bernadette and to never approach that sheep at any costs. You don't know if that was a warning or just jingoism. So who do you visit.

choices: Bernadette Catches RJ and brings him to her apartment to eat him
14521.content:
RJ decided that Bernadette would probably be the best choice. After all, what harm could she be? She was a sheep. So, he walked up to Bernadette's door and knocked on it. "Hello!" he yelled. "Are you Bernadette? I'm RJ, your downstairs neighbor." As if on cue, the obese sheep woman opened the door and looked down at RJ. She adjusted her glasses and took a good look at RJ waving at her before she smiled.

"Oh," she said. "A cute little human man. How convenient." RJ looked in confusion before Bernadette closed her eyes and bent down to his level, shaking her large belly and woolly butt as she showed her teeth. She was wearing nothing but a blue bra and jean shorts that might as well be a thong. "Now," said Bernadette. "Do you want to be cooked or swallowed whole when I eat you for breakfast." "Eat me?!" yelled RJ. Bernadette smiled and nodded her head. "Of course, I haven't had breakfast yet and you look delicious."

Bernadette then kicked open the door to her apartment and RJ gasped. Littering the floor were human skeletons. The sheep was carnivorous and she licked her lips as she rubbed her stomach. RJ was forced to run as Bernadette came after him. "Yummy, yummy, yummy! Human's going in my tummy!" Bernadette sang to herself as she ran forward. RJ couldn't believe how such a fat sheep could move so rapidly. He had to make it to the stairs fast, or Bernadette would no doubt eat him.
14521.title: Black Sheep

145211.content:
RJ swore he never ran so fast in his life, but with a man eating sheep on his heels, he wouldn't be surprised if he broke a few records. To her credit, Bernadette was pretty fast for being so big!

RJ didn't even bother actually stepping down the stairs and opted to just jump down them. Bernadette, not one to allow her prey to escape started doing the same thing. However, her extra bulk threw off her landing on the very first flight of stairs, giving RJ a good head start. By the time Bernadette picked herself up, RJ had already made to the stairs to the second floor.

That didn't deter the sheep, however.

"I'm gonna get you, you tasty little morsel!" She called after him.

RJ didn't even respond and just ran faster.

It was when he finally got to the first floor that...
145211.title: Bernadette Chases RJ Downstairs

14521111.content:
"Sabrina?!" was RJ's response as he stumbled back.

"RJ?" the albino wolf questioned. "What are you in such a hurry for?"

"Well, you see-" the young man started to respond but was cut off.

"Finally caught up with you, breakfast!"

RJ whirled around to see Bernadette rounding the corner. The obese sheep was clearly out of breath but she heaved forward anyway, a triumphant smile on her face. At least until she noticed Sabrina.

"Oh no!" Bernadette exclaimed. "Not you."

"Yeah, me." said Sabrina, her red eyes narrowing. The plump wolfess moved forward so that she stood between RJ and Bernadette."You really haven't changed."

"And why should I, human-lover?!" Bernadette spat. "It's not illegal to eat humans! It never has been!"

"That doesn't make it, right!" Sabrina growled.

Bernadette scoffed. "Oh spare me the whole 'Humans-have-rights-too' routine. I got enough of that from you in high school!"

RJ just stood there taking this all in as the two went back and forth. Apparently, this had been going on for quite awhile and even before he met Sabrina or Bernadette. It would explain how Sabrina knew the sheep.

"Look," Bernadette started, "I don't want trouble I just want breakfast." She looked past Sabrina for a moment at RJ before turning back to the wolf.

Sabrina growled. "He's not on the menu!"

Bernadette gave an irritated sigh before trying to push past Sabrina. Sabrina immediately reacted by pushing the sheep back.

Bernadette glared, Sabrina glared, and RJ gulped. This was about to get ugly.
14521111.title: It's an ally!

choices: Her house; she's got antiacid pills there
R.J.'s apartment to cough him up
145211112.content:
Bernadette tried pushing past Sabrina again, this time though, Sabrina was unable to push her back but instead was only able to hold her back.

"Oh come on! He's almost within my grasp! Nobody's gonna miss him and sooner or later if I don't eat him someone else will!" Bernadette reasoned.

Eventually Sabrina was able to shove her away again, "I said no!" Sabrina snarled, "when are you gonna give it up?!"

"When he's tucked away in somebody's tummy! Preferably mine!" Bernadette replied.

Sabrina continued to scowl at Bernadette but as she did, her mind seemed to be working, it was as if she was having an internal conflict over something. And suddenly, she stood straight up. "You can't eat R.J." She flatly stated, she then turned to face R.J. Herself. "Because I'm going to eat him."

R.J. Stared at Sabrina with unbelieving eyes, her red eyes briefly expressed regret as they softened for but a moment before returning to their cold gaze and cutting through his own confused gaze. As she approached him R.J. Scurried backwards, but he didn't run, partially because he didn't think she'd really eat him and partly because he didn't know where he could run to if she was serious. Eventually he found his back against a wall and Savrina towered over him.

"Sabrina, knock it off! This isn't funny!" R.J. Shouted as she gripped him with her paws.

With her back to Bernadette her face briefly reverted to its normal, kind nature before she whispered, 'sorry, but you just have to trust me.' Her face then returned to that of a cold and merciless predator. She licked her lips before shoving R.J.'s head into her mouth. She gulped him down slowly, running her tongue along his face and arms as she swallowed him.

Bernadette, who had been watching with a smirk and folded arms; dropped her jaw out of shock. She'd thought it was just an act, she'd never thought for a split second that Sabrina would actually eat a human, let alone her friend!

Sabrina turned around to face her with a slightly larger stomach, she was already on the heavy side, so it was kinda hard to tell that she had a human in her gut. "Well? Are we done here?" Sabrina asked nonchalantly as her stomach writhed and groaned while R.J. Struggled about in it.

"You... You ate him" Bernadette said as she just stared in awe.

"You said the only way you'd leave him alone is if someone ate him. Since I'm his friend I feel that I'm doing him a favor, you said it yourself, someone was going to eat him eventually, I'd rather it was me than some stranger or jerk that just felt like a snack." Sabrina stated

Disappointed and shocked, Bernadette turned ands slunk off back to her apartment. As soon as she was out of earshot, Sabrina looked at her belly, "are you okay in here R.J.?"

1452111122.content:
Sabrina decided to head back to RJ's apartment as it was closer.

Reaching the door, she turned the knob and was surprised when it simply opened.

"Really,RJ? Leaving your apartment unlocked?" Sabrina chided gently.

"I didn't plan to be gone long." RJ spoke up. "Thought I just go out for a second meet some of the neighbors."

Sabrina sighed as she entered the residence. "Look, RJ, that's nice and all, but it's dangerous out there." She thought for a second. "Also, why didn't you stay away from Bernadette? I warned you about her."

"Look, I'm sorry, Sabrina. But I'm still getting used to the fact that I could get eaten. I just didn't think..." RJ trailed guiltily.

"What's done is done. Just be more careful. Now, let's get you out of there."

It took about 30 seconds of retching before, RJ felt himself being pushed back up Sabrina's esophagus by her powerful insides. RJ was quickly deposited on his apartment's floor covered in a thick layer of saliva with a panting Sabrina standing over him.

"You (pant) okay?" The albino wolfess asked breathlessly.

RJ picked himself up. "Yeah, I'm good, though I could use a shower." He smiled. "Thanks for the save again."

Sabrina returned the smile. "No problem but let's not make that a repeat occurrence."

RJ gave her a nod. "Yeah, I don't plan too. So, what're you going to do now?"

The wolfess crossed her arms under her bosom. "Well, I was in the neighborhood and decided to see my sister. Then I ran into you."

"That's right, you did say she lived here."

"Yep. We haven't talked in a while." Sabrina stated sadly.

"That's too bad."

"I know, she's real nice but she doesn't have a lot of friends and she's a bit of recluse. I was hoping to introduce you two, so that you'd both have someone here to at least talk to."

RJ thought about it for a second. "I don't see why we can't. How about I go clean up and we'll go meet her?"

Sabrina flashed him a grateful smile. "Sure!"

"Oh, piss off!" Sabrina grunted back.

Bernadette lashed out again, her left ankle coming out of Sabrina's grasp. A second later her hoof smashed itself into Sabrina's muzzle to RJ's dismay. His dismay quickly became shock when Sabrina retiliated by bringing her jaws down on Bernadette's leg. The sheep all but screamed bloody murder!

1452111122211.content:
RJ stood in absolute awe. He couldn't tell what about the scene terrified him more; the insane, massive sheep-woman trying to devour him in his own apartment, or the fact that Sabrina, Sabrina had bitten someone, baring sharp teeth still dripping with blood.

In Bernadette's scream of anguish, Sabrina had apt time lunge onto the flailing sheep and wrap an arm tight around her opponent's neck in a firm chokehold, wrenching her other arm around Bernadette's eyes. "RJ, HIDE!!!"

Whether by her words or his own, RJ leapt behind the couch in a flash, clamping his hands over his head.

With his face planted against the living room's carpet, he could only hear the two plus-sized woman dole it out in a brawl spanning the entire room, rolling around on the ground, smashing into tables, all studded with pained grunts as the two punched and kicked at one another, either to wrench free and leap onto RJ or throw the crazy one out.

"LEMME GO, YOU BIG SOFTIE!!!"

"LIKE HELL!!! THIS ISN'T EVEN YOUR APARTMENT!!!"

Somebody slammed into the wall, sending every single picture to the ground, shattering. The door swung ajar, giving RJ a glimpse for potential escape. He squatted up, hoping that the battle would stay in the further corner of the room...

...and then it happened.

Somebody screamed, but she was muffled, madly beating at the other, with a few high-pitched chokes from the other. It went on for many long, strained moments until somebody finally took a clear, deep breath.

"...hello?" The battle had ceased completely, but RJ still, very slowly stood up to look over the couch.

Bernadette couldn't be seen, but Sabrina sure as hell could. Her body was as big as portly she was before, but her formerly nicely-sized gut was now absolutely colossal, sitting on the ground in a tight, spheric bulge that jutted out several feet away from her arm's reach, thriving with dulled screams hollering inside.

"Ugh..." Sabrina gurgled sickly, following with a soft belch. "RJ, are...are you okay?"

"Sabrina?" RJ slowly approached the stuffed wolf, gazing upon a sight he never imagined being real. "Did you just...eat her?"

"I-I just panicked!" Sabrina squeaked, talking just as much to herself as RJ. "S-She was gonna hurt you, and I didn't know how long I could hold her off, and...and...oh, I'm so sorry!"

"Hey, hey, it's alright..." Frankly, Bernadette's well being was pretty damn far from his concerns, but the idea of Sabrina voring someone down was still coming as a shock to him. He plopped into an armchair that was still standing, laying his face in his hands. "...well, this is certainly one of those landmark days."

"RJ, this is serious! I just ate somebody!"

"You're right, I'm sorry. But what I wanna know is what we're gonna do now?"

...Anna, Sabrina's older! Now RJ hadn't met Anna in person or even seen her around but Sabrina had described her enough that he was pretty sure he could recognize her. The huge wolfess bent down a bit, leaning over her huge belly to get a better look at him.

"You're RJ, right?" She asked, rather politely.

What would happen to Sabrina? As far as RJ knew, there were no laws against anthros eating humans but he really didn't know if there were laws about anthros eating other anthros.

"Let her in RJ." Sabrina called from inside the apartment.

"Wha?" RJ asked, his pondering broken.

Sabrina answered again, sounding resigned. "She'll find out anyway and it's my sister. I trust her."

RJ paused for a second before sighing. "If you're sure."

He stepped away from the the door, allowing Anna to enter. The titanic wolf came into the apartment and immediately noticed her sister and, more importantly, her humongous gut. Anna stared wide-eye at her little sister while Sabrina gave her a nervous smile. RJ just stood between them, waiting for things to proceed.

Anna let out a deep breath. "Okay," She started slowly. ",what happened?"

For the next several minutes, Sabrina and RJ explained all that had happened with Bernadette, with said sheep making her presence known with a kick, punch or angry face pressing against Sabrina's skin. Anna just listened the entire time, never interrupting, her face calm. When the explanation was done, Anna walked over to her sister before...

1452111122211212.content:
Anna's belly was far too big for her to approach Sabrina by the front as she dragged herself across the room, thus she was forced to shuffle around so she was facing her sister by the side. She leaned to the left, squishing the pilling love handles around her waist as she reached down to lay a palm on Sabrina's engorged belly, only to get a punch back from Bernadette's fist. Anna's paw flinch away, and she slowly looked up to meet her sister's eyes with a deathly serious look.

"...you know we're gonna have to hide this." She stated evenly.

"Oh, no..." Sabrina squeaked with eyes wide in terror, practically pure red by her shrunken pupils.

"She saved my life!" RJ immediately argued, stepping up next to them. "If she didn't eat her, Id've been killed! Couldn't we say it was self defense, or something?"

"Well, it'd be a pretty big help if you weren't a human."

"Anna, RJ's my friend!"

"Listen, Sabrina, I've known humans too, and I would've done the same for them!" Anna snapped back. "But this is wolf on sheep we're talking about. You and I know the court's not gonna buy a minute of our little heartwarming drama here when we're on the stand!"

"Okay, maybe, but what am I supposed to do?" Sabrina begged. "I've got work the entire week after monday, and everybody'll know that I ate Bernadette the minute I step out of the building all fat and happy when she's gone missing!"

"I know, just...just lemme think."

The elder wolfess rose back up, the gears in her brain visibly turning as she trudged up to the window spanning along the wall, scratching the side of her head. RJ couldn't make heads or tails of what Anna was thinking as she gazed along the cityscape with contemplative eyes, until finally she snapped her claws, smirking triumphantly.

"Eating Contest." She finally spoke. "Two weeks from now, there's auditioning for an eating contest going on downtown. It's sponsored by the ASL, so they'll take in anybody who's fat enough!"

"...what're you saying?" Sabrina lead unsurely.

"We'll enter you into the contest saying that I'd fattened you up to enter. That'll explain everything!"

"The hell kind of a plan is that!?" RJ sneered. "If she wins, we'll have the entire city looking back at us!"

"Who said she's gonna win?" Anna rebounded. "I used to work at these things all the time, and I know there's a ton of judging rounds that are watched only by officials. We'll work our way up a bit, but at the very last second Sabrina'll give out and get rejected. The judges'll believe our excuse, and we won't have the public eye on our asses!"

"...and Bernadette?"

"Easy. I've got some friends I can call who'll smash up her car and dump it over the city bridge. Once it pops up, all we'll have on our hands is a car accident and a dejected fighter. How's that all sound?"

"Awful!" Sabrina spat in disgust. "I don't wanna go down as some criminal! I...I..."

"You're not a criminal, Sabrina!" Anna interrupted. "You were doing nothing but helping out a friend. If anything, I'm gonna be the one who schemed up this whole thing and roped you and your friend in. That's all!"

"Maybe, but...but..."

"Sabrina, listen to me." Anna pointed at her face, directing "You're not somebody who deserves to go to jail, whether you're okay with it or not. I'm not gonna let that happen and ever go to bed knowing that you of anybody I knew was in there for some bullshit law when she was just helping out a friend. Okay?"

Sabrina's mouth opened, but no answer came out. RJ could see plain on her face the ideas of confessing and going guilt-free or being locked away battled around in her mind, until finally she sighed in defeat.

"Alright. I'll do it." She answered quietly.

"Okay." Anna nodded. "We're set."

"So...what now?" RJ asked.

"Well, I'll call up my friends tomorrow morning, but I gotta know, Sabrina: did anybody see you here today?"

"Nobody but Bernadette. Why?"

"Sorry, RJ, but you're gonna have company for a while." Anna noted, stepping into the center of the room. "We can't have anybody seeing us yet, so we're gonna have to spend a week or two here until Sabrina looks less a vorer and more a fighter. That alright?"

"I...I guess I could make room." RJ agreed, even if he doubted there even was any for Anna. "Might have to scrounge up some stuff so we can all sleep, though."

"Eh, that's not a problem." Anna rolled forward so she was laying on her own belly, her maw laying inside her cleavage like they were a pair of pillows. "I'm my own bed."

"...and I could let Sabrina lay on by bed, with me on the couch, so I think we're all set."

"Alright, so from here on, we're in action." Anna held out an open hand, her palm facing the ground. "You guys in?"

RJ and Sabrina cast each other a final doubtful look before they, too, piled their hands atop Anna's. "Deal." They said simultaneously.

"So. Any ideas for supper?"

1452111122211212221.content:
"The main thing we're going to focus on, is stomach capacity." Anna started.

Sabrina quirked a brow. "Um...you sure we should do that?"

She gestured to her larger body. RJ took a moment to look at his friend. While Anna was very tall and most of her weight was focused around her belly, Sabrina was more proportionate. Large breasts bigger than RJ's head, a belly that could have been a small couch for him, and a butt that that could have squashed the front of a car. He blushed a little when he realized he was ogling and composed himself.

"I don't want to end up a blimp." Sabrina finished, hands on her large hips.

Anna gave her sister a patient nod. "We're not going to go all out or anything but we have to be convincing. Look, a lot of anthros try out for ASL sponsored competitions. Good showings can help them get recruited. Most of them fail outright with how much they've got to eat. We can't be one of those."

"I don't see the problem." RJ spoke up, getting the two sisters' attention. "I mean, Sabrina has bulked up quite a bit. Wouldn't that be enough to make our cover work once she goes to the competition."

"Sadly, nope." Anna shook her head, her tone grave. "You got to understand, RJ. We anthros can eat a lot in one go. You saw what my little sis did to Bernadette. But remember, it took her all night to digest and she wasn't going to be eating anything during that time. If an anthro doesn't condition her stomach to eat so much, so fast, she'll take forever to digest. It'll be so easy to tell that she's done no training...how will we explain how she got so big so fast and Bernadette's gone missing? Oh, and her coworker/friend and sister live in the same building as Bernadette?"

RJ grimanced. "Well...when you put it like that..."

Sabrina sighed. "I'm just going to have to deal with being a little bigger." She said, resigned.

"Don't worry, Sabrina. Remember, you just have to look decent and win a few rounds and then take a dive. So, yeah, you'll get a little bigger by the time we're done. It won't be that bad. At worst, you'll be as big as me." Anna pointed out, a small grin.

Sabrina gave a light giggle. "I never really did like being the runt..."

"Okay, so that's settled." RJ interceded. "But what are we going to need?"

"Food." Anna stated simply. "We're gonna make a small feast. I've got enough stocked in my own apartment to feed a human army or three, so that won't be a problem. If anyone asks what I'm doing, I'm teaching you, RJ, how to cook."

"Won't we have to worry about Zelda?" RJ asked, nervously. "She's always sniffing around my apartment, looking for me."

Anna scoffed. "Don't worry about her. Zelda only gets away with how she acts because you're human. Not that that's a bad thing but that means that she can bully you if you give her a reason. But when it comes to someone her own size, Zelda's a wimp. If she even comes around here, I'll scare her off just by being here. She'll barely ask a few questions."

"What her seeing us? I thought we were supposed to lay low?"

"Not only is Zelda a pushover, most of the others are scared of me. I'm one of the biggest tenants here and most don't know me that well. Whatever I'm doing, they'll clear the way just to stay in my good graces. It's Sabrina they can't see. It also helps that Bernadette kept to herself. She never really had friends and would go off on her own a lot."

Anna thought for a second before continuing. "Oh yeah, that reminds me. RJ, I'll need you to help to get all the food and to me cook up everything and, once that's done, make Sabrina, here comfortable."

Sabrina blushed. "W-What?!?"

RJ wasn't much better. "What's THAT supposed to mean?!!" He exclaimed.

Anna held her hands up in defense. "Calm down! What I mean is that while Sabrina's making a hog out of herself, you'll just have to rub her belly and back. Just to loosen her up a bit. What did you think I meant?" Anna finished, giving the two a teasing looking.

The wolfess and human looked at each other for a second, blushed harder before looking away.

"Let-Let's just get the food." RJ said, highly embarrassed.

----------------------------------

It took about three hours to get everything set up: an hour to get all of the food from Anna's apartment and another two to cook it all up. It was worth it, however. Sabrina was situated on the couch with plates and plates of food set before her. Fried chicken, microwave pizzas, tv dinners, hotdogs, hamburgers, etc. RJ noted that the food were all sorts of things you found in common grocery stores. Then he considered that Anna worked in one, so it really shouldn't have been all that surprised, to tell the truth.

"I think you made too much..." Sabrina drawled, her eyes traveling to each plate of food, noting how it filled up most of the room before her.

Anna shrugged. "Whatever you don't eat now, we'll just save for later in the day. It's not really a problem. Now get to it, sis!"

However, he knew that wasn't really Sabrina's fault and he wasn't about to take that out on her or Anna. When he got out the shower, he was still going to stick to the plan and help Sabrina digest all that. Come to think of it, I'll probably have to do that for Anna, too. At that thought he shrugged his shoulders, it wasn't that big a deal.

It smelt like death and following it, RJ sees Sabrina groaning in pain as she clutches her stomach, while her sister is trying to figure out what's wrong.
"Thank god, RJ! It's been five minutes after you left when her stomach started to hurt. Any idea what's wrong, cause she's not allergic to anything, right?"
Looking around, RJ picks up the food packaging and looks over it when his eyes spotted something on it. It was the expiration date and while it looked like any ordinary one, RJ's eyes bulged out.
"Anna, when did you get this food?"
"Just a couple of days ago. Why?" Anna answers back, curious at RJ's discovery.
"Well, I might know the problem, as the food expired about a week ago!" RJ exclaims, the wolf's eyes widen in horror, as Sabrina focuses on her stomach ache and releases deathly colon fumes into the already tainted air.
"No wonder he sold me that stuff so cheaply! He's so dead when I get my hands on him!" She yells in anger, when her little sister's stomach grumbles loudly, and menacingly as well.
Rubbing her stomach, Sabrina loosens her backdoor finally from the pressure and starts ripping farts loudly, which one sounding wet.
"Shit, literally! She's going to blow. Anna, help me get Sabrina into the bathroom!" RJ shouts, Anna snapping to attention and helps the human lift her sister up.
Picking her up, they both lead Sabrina to RJ's bathroom, aware of the 'bomb' they're carrying.
"Steady, steady, steady now. Sabrina, hold it in as long as possible until we're inside. Can you do that?" RJ asks, Sabrina nodding her head, as the pain was too much for her to talk, tears forming in her eyes.
They were halfway there when Sabrina's belly gurgled violently, followed by a sickening wet fart, that sounded like a shart, everyone's eyes widening.
"Oh no! She's gonna blow!" Anna cries out and roughly throws her sister into the bathroom, you with her.
Pulling down her pants and panties, RJ didn't get a chance to turn around to run, when the albino wolf plops her rump on your toilet and noisily vacates her bowels. The smell was worse than her farts and RJ would of passed out, if not for his willpower. Jumping out of there, RJ shuts the door behind him so the smell wouldn't spread past the bathroom and attempts to catch his breath.
"Remember to flush, Sabrina," RJ shouts, trying to be loud enough to heard through Sabrina's bowel orchestra.
Once RJ and Anna breathing reached a level where they can talk, the human applauds the wolf anthro.
"Nice *pant* throw, Anna."
"No, thanks for *pant* not letting my sister *pant* shitting herself! God, it reeks here!"
"Be thankful for *pant* living here!" RJ tiredly protests, before both parties start to laugh at the ridiculous of the situation.
Once the laughter ended, both return to the living room and RJ grabs something to eat.
"An extreme way to remind me to check the expiration date," The wolf bbw jokes.
"Not funny and are you alright, Anna? You ate some that food too!" You worryingly ask.
"I got an iron stomach. Had 10 humans go nuts in my gut and everything flowed smoothly," she answers confidently, until she see RJ look at her with horror across his face.
"Sabrina has your back, so your good," she adds in, lessen RJ's panic to a degree.

145211112221121223.content:
...but instead, he froze as, for the first time in five years of living in Furdale, had use for the wide, gaping hallways of his apartment.

Just overnight, Sabrina's ballooned from her porky bounce into an outright ball, one much bigger and rounder than anything he'd expect even from chowing down on Bernadette. She'd even shot up by a foot and some, yet her face still clenched with each step as she pushed around a belly so big and round that he almost thought that she was still bloated from the late psychotic sheep, even though it sagged down onto the carpet in a massive balloon of pure blubber. Many pictures along the wall were pushed off their hooks as her stomach scraped along both walls of the corridor, with shoulders coning above that stood only inches away, but they also hoisted around a pair of breasts teetering as wide and plentiful that, on their lonesome, put her late waistband of yesterday to shame.

She hadn't bothered to change out of her pajamas, being too sickened and winded from her new workout to bother as they were tugged up along her body only inches under her chest, with three deep wrinkles stretched in from her breasts' furthest points. She even made her glasses look too small, which were more awkwardly perched around the extra amount of girth that'd been pumped into her face.

"Hi...RJ..." She panted, tongue slopping out of her maw.

"Hey...Sabrina," RJ'd gotten out. It was Sabrina's voice, and her hair, and the albino pigment that bleached her body, but he was reeled away from looking at the blimp hoisting herself around his home as his long loved coworker.

Flopping her head around, she cleared her head up enough to see RJ much more clearly, and didn't seem all to pleased by the reality hanging off her body. "Yeah, felt the same way in the bathroom..."

"Are you alright? How do you feel?"

"Like I just ate a gajillion calories in one night, so..." An empty growl coarsed around in her belly, pushing up her throat in the form of a loud belch. "...just peachy."

"Eh, you'll get used to it."

The two looked back at the living room, where Anna was leaning against the wall. She had an impressed grin along her maw, but the two could still see she was pushing down a feeling of amazement fluttering around inside of her.

"Damn, sis, I'd never thought I'd live to see the day!" She laughed.

"Never imagined I would, either..." More awakened, Sabrina lugged herself along the rest of the way down the hall. RJ stepped out of the way, watching the two until he could see that, although still a close call, Sabrina only stood a foot or so under her sister, but was getting close to having a shape that swelled out as much from her spine.

Anna planted a paw on her sister's shoulder. "Listen, a few weeks of walking'll clear it up in no time. Soon enough, you won't notice a thing, save popping a few belt sizes here and there. Alright?"

"Well, I'm long beyond the threshold of turning back, so," Sabrina shrugged. "Might as well walk the rest of the way."

"That's the spirit?" Her paw lifted away, smacking back down along one of her new lovehandles. "Besides, this'll open up a whole lot of stuff for us. Now that your this big..."

Before you even have a chance to run, the huge sheep-woman has her arms locked around you, and drags you into her apartment.
"You aren't too bright, are you. Didn't anyone warn you about me?" She asks with mock curiosity.

You have to agree with her there. Despite the warnings and the obvious danger, you just had to find out more about your neighbor, didn't you? Now look where your good intentions have gotten you. You're about to be Sheep food. How embarrassing.

"I'm still waiting for an answer, you know. I may be about to eat you, but I'm at least slightly merciful, so I'll ask again; should I swallow you whole, or cook you first?"

'Merciful', she says.
Well, the choice is yours. Into the oven, or straight to the stomach?

1452122.content:
"Cook me?!" yelled R.J. "Are you crazy!? I'd rather be digested!" Bernadette licked her lips and then lifted the human into the air. "That can be arranged." Before R.J. could say another word, the obese sheep giantess opened her mouth wide and shoved him in head first. R.K. struggled and tried to reach out of her mouth, but Bernadette sucked him further inside until only his legs were sticking out of the sheep's maw.

Bernadette licked all over R.J.'s body to savor his taste before she sucked in his feet and moaned in ecstasy. With one large gulp, Bernadette successfully swallows him, causing R.J. to land in her acid filled belly. Her already monstrous sized belly bulged further out before the sheep woman rubbed it and let out a thunderous belch. "Ah," she said as she let out a slightly smaller burp. "Human. The other white meat. That was a good breakfast. Now, I better get going to work." Inside Bernadette's massive belly, R.J. looked in shock. He had just been eaten and by a sheep woman. He could hear her insides gurgle as outside Bernadette locks her apartment door and walks out.

Bernadette hummed to herself as she rubbed her stomach. "Let me out!" yelled R.J. as he pounded on the sheep's stomach walls. "Please let me out!" Bernadette belched again before tapping her belly. "Sorry human, you don't understand how it works. Anybody I eat, stays eaten. Don't feel bad, the skeletons usually survive the trip."

In the belly, R.J's skin was being burned as the heat got to R.J. He was even panting heavily because every time Bernadette burped, it took some of his oxygen away. R.J. kept pounding the stomach walls, but to no avail. Soon Bernadette reached the library where she worked. At the front desk was a large rat woman who looked as big as her and just as fat with gray fur and black hair worn in a ponytail. "Whoa Bernadette," says the rat woman. "You look bigger than usual today." Bumps appeared on Bernadette's stomach as the sheep woman giggled. "Oh that. Just a human I ate for breakfast." The rat woman licked her lips outside. "Lucky. Humans are so delicious."

It looked like R.J. was in trouble because he was getting hit with more acid as Bernadette kept walking. If this kept up, he'd be digested in no time. But R.J. remembered he had his cell phone in his pocket. Maybe Sabrina could help him. Wasting no time, R.J. dialed Sabrina's phone number. But could he get a signal from inside a sheep's belly?
1452122.title: Sheep Food

14521222.content:
"Come on, come on," R.J. muttered. He stuck his cellphone into the air and tried to maneuver it to a spot where he'd get a signal, but nothing was working. "One bar, I just need one lousy, little bar!"

Outside the stomach, Bernadette sound down next to her friend. She let her flabby, wooly stomach role out in all its glory and loosened her pants. The rat girl stared at the struggling lump with naked envy.

"Anyone we know?"

"Nah," Bernadette said, smacking her belly and watching it jiggle. "He's just a neighbor from my building."

"He's a human who lived in a building for anthros?" the rat girl asked, laughing. "Is he stupid?"

"Since he walked right up to my door to introduce himself, I'd say... Yes. It was awfully neighborly of him to give himself up as my breakfast though. I woke up late and I was afraid I'd have to go through this shift on an empty stomach."

"Maybe he's part of a new human delivery service?" the rat girl said and both she and Bernadette burst out laughing. R.J. tried not to focus on their cruel laughter, or the ominous gurgles from all around him, or the tingling sensation of the stomach acid against his skin, or the fact that his clothes were already falling apart. All he focused on was getting a damn signal! Yet an hour passed and one never came. He couldn't help it, he started to cry.

Bernadette was busy stacking a shelf with books when she heard R.J. sobbing. She couldn't help but laugh. It was so pathetic. "Awww, widdle baby," she cooed. "What's wrong? Don't like being digested in my big belly?"

"SHUT UP!" R.J. snapped.

"Lemme guess," the sheep purred. "You're finally realizing that your phone won't work?" R.J. kept quiet and her smile widened. "Yeah, sorry, babe, but I forgot to tell you. My stomach doesn't have great reception. No body's ever managed to get a signal out. Sorry to disappoint you."

She didn't sound sorry at all. R.J. could hear the joy in her voice. She was reveling in this. The sound made R.J. enraged. She was killing him and found it funny!

"LET ME OUT! LET ME OUT!" R.J. kicked and screamed, redoubling his efforts to escape Bernadette's stomach.

"Urp!" The giant sheep let out a small burp into her fist. "Hey--urp--cut it out! You're--BRAP--gonna give me--Oooarrp--indigestion--" Bernadette made a fist and pounded against her chest as the gas built up.

UUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPP!

All around her the library shook from the force of her belch. It echoed through the building. Anthros snapped up from their books in terror, some thinking it was an earthquake. At last it subsided and all eyes fell on the blushing sheep standing in the aisle. One anthro, an ancient, elderly owl raised a talon to her beak.

"Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh..."

The owl shushed her then nodded matter-of-factly before turning back to her book. Everyone else followed her example and went back to reading, though a few anthros shot confused glances at Bernadette's backside as she went back to work.

"They're," the sheep snapped. "Hope you're happy human, cause you're not going--human?" Bernadette paused. The screams and struggles coming from her stomach had stopped. She tapped her stomach. "Human? You still alive in there?" No response. Bernadette snorted. "Well that's what you get. Thanks for the meal, neighbor."

And with that, Bernadette went back to work and carried out an otherwise uneventful shift. By the time she got home, R.J. was long dead. What the sheep had promised earlier proved true. His skeleton did survive the trip. Not that that was much comfort to R.J. in his current state. His bleached bones joined the cemetery of past meals cluttering the floors of Bernadette's apartment and was quickly forgotten, one snack among a lifetime's worth, nothing special at all.

The door opened briskly, revealing Reba wearing a black robe. The kitsune's hair was a tad messy, most likely from just getting up. In her hands was a mug of what smelled like to be coffee.

What really got RJ's attention was just how tall Reba was. In all honesty, he wasn't too tall but he wasn't a shrimp but Reba was the tallest anthro he'd ever seen. He just came up to her waist. As his eyes traveled upwards, he took in the rest of her. The robe she was wearing did a pretty good job of hiding her form but RJ could still make out her generous hips and bust through the fabric. He also noted the nine tails moving to and frow behind her. Finally, his gaze arrived at her face. Framed by her waist length hair, Reba's face; rather slim and elegant with a dainty black nose. Overall, she was gorgeous and lived up to what he had heard.

But for all that, Reba's eyes took the cake. The whites of her eyes were a little red, whether from waking up, crying OR lack of sleep, RJ didn't know. But what he did know was that those eyes were sizing him up. Two pools of amber met RJ's gaze and for a second he was lost. It was like Reba was staring into his soul. He soon however mentally kicked himself. He came here to introduce himself, not ogle!

The entire time, Reba watched, interested. Here was the human she had heard about who had moved to Furdale. At first, she laughed about. What kind of human would move to a place where they could be eaten at any moment? It was absurd. But sure enough, he moved in and now here he was at her door, looking all friendly. Kind of cute, really.She raised a brow as watched his face twitch a bit. He's actually resisting? she pondered.

It was subtle, but that was what made it so effective. Most couldn't throw it off unless they had a decent amount of exposure to it or had enough will power. Reba doubted the human had much contact with her kind, so that meant he actually had some will power. That was interesting as it was surprising.

RJ smiled up at her, surprising her again, and spoke. "Hi, there. I'm RJ and I just moved in. I'm just going around and getting to know my neighbors." He offered her a hand to shake.

Reba blinked. Did the human not realize how much danger he was in? She was bigger and stronger than him. Not too mention that her kind tended to eat his. Well, most of her kind. Reba had never eaten a human, mainly due to having never met one and she never felt like going out of her way to go after one. Could this be her opportunity? You ooen one and grab as much baby oil as you can find. As soon as you come back both you and albert start rubbing the oil all over her legs.

"Ooh that feels nice guys. Maybe I should break through walls more often."

"I'd rather you not do that, Mistress Linda. Your mother probably doesn't want to see your legs stuck in walls." Reginald says as Linda begins to wiggle her legs back into the room. She opens her door and she now has to duck to actually get through the door, and the door was built for someone the size of her mother to fit through.

Looking at her tough you notice that she was a curvy dragon girl with her breasts and belly being large but her thighs and ass being astronomical! Her ass alone must have been bigger than your childhood home at this point. On top of that the dragon girl you assumed was about 30ft tall was now taller than her mother, but just how tall was she though?
1453312.title: Linda is growing and she broke through a wall

15.title: Choices! Hooray!

153.content:
RJ tugged at the collar of his shirt. He was feeling hot in his fancy clothes. Checking his watch, he was still technically early despite being there for nearly half an hour. His heart was pounding hard, nervous as to whether or not his date was coming. It had taken him a lot of time and courage to ask her out, and he was overjoyed when she had said yes. The waiter came by the table again, looking a bit more annoyed than last time. He was a middle aged wolf anthro with grey fur.

"Would you like to order anything now, sir? A drink, perhaps?"
"...I'll have water for now, but when she comes, can you bring out a bottle of wine?"
"Of course, sir. Which bottle would you care for?"

After talking with him for a few minutes, they decided on a bottle with quite the pricy label. As he walked away, he pulled out the chair opposite to you and walked away.

"Sorry, did I make you wait?" RJ stood up fast to greet his date.
"No, I haven't been here long. Please, have a seat. I hope you don't mind that I ordered us some wine."
"That sounds perfect." As they sat down, the waiter returned and poured them glasses of red wine and left the bottle. RJ smiled and taped his glass against her's.

"I'm glad you could come tonight,..."
Who is RJ's date?
153.title: He's got a date

1531.content:
Sabrina smiled sheepishly, nervously toying with her watch. "I'm really sorry...I promise, I tried my best to get here on time!"

"Ah, don't worry about it, I'm just glad you're here." RJ smiled back, snapping open his menu. "Im guessing you were busy at the eye doctor, or something?"

"Nope, I got 'em this morning." She answered, clueing RJ in on that she was blinking a little bit more than usual, clearly having never worn contacts before. "Just wanted to make sure tonight was absolutely perfect. What do you think?"

Truth be told, RJ couldn't have cared less if she came in with her workwear on, but right then, he had to stamp down on his own foot to keep a straight face. By no means was Sabrina an unattractive girl, but when she really put in an effort to clean herself up, she was such a looker that RJ struggled to remember she was even an albino in the first place. With her fur fresh from the shower, her silvery hair was tied back into an intricate bun whose fringes almost mimicked the petals to a rose, a few bangs hanging before eyes that were painted by thick black eyeliner and mascara of a deep, pale purple. Topping off the ensemble was a crimson dress tied around her neck by a single loop, nicely fitting her figure even with her large gut hanging past her crotch, showing off enough of her sizable breasts that they were pretty much keeping the dress on themselves.

"...I love it!" RJ forced out, biting his lip.

Sabrina giggled, dampening her classy demure only a little. "Thank you!"

"Your orders, sir and madame?"

RJ and Sabrina both flinched, seeing the wolf waiter from before obediently step up to their table.

"Uh..." RJ desperately looked through his menu, trying to find something appealing through all the French-sunding names. Crap...crap...CRAP! "A...cheeseburger, side of fries?"

"Of course, sir." The waiter deadpanned, taking his menu before turning to Sabrina. "...and you, madame?"

"I'll just go with the chicken tenders." She answered, politely handing him the menu herself.

"Very good, miss. Enjoy your evening." The waiter bowed, then slinked back to head for the kitchen.

"So..." Sabrina awkwardly began, setting her hands on her lap and looking around. "Glad to get away from beta, huh?"

"Yeah...yeah." RJ replied, sipping from his water.

"Lemme tell you, I'll be amazed if Gatling 3 even gets ratings past the lower quarter." She continued, scratching her chin. "The only time I'm gonna be happy about that game is when it's out of our servers."

"Uh...definitely."

Sabrina nodded. She opened her fingers up and stared down her claws, observing her manicure. "So...anything you'd like to talk about?"

"Well..." This is it, man, your chance to really pull her in. Say something! "How was your day?"

"Just fine!" She answered merely, but RJ could barely hear her as he smacked himself in his head. "Traffic here was pretty bad, but other than that, nothing to complain. You?"

"Eh...not much, really."

Sabrina nodded, glancing around at her surroundings, again. "...seen any good movies, lately?"


Choice 1: To keep the evening going, after supper, RJ takes them somewhere else.

Choice 2: Some form of disaster happens during their dinner.

Choice 3: RJ goes to the bathroom to compose himself, but on the way, he's confronted by another, more massive wolfess...
1531.title: Sabrina

info.brief_description: Can a human computer wiz complete his job while surviving hungry anthros?
info.description:
You will be guiding the Human character RJ during his stay in the city of Furdale in the Anthro world, helping him get out of or into trouble. The Anthro world is just as modern as the human one but with the inclusion of the residents having more females than males and the fact that they're far taller, bigger and stronger than humans...there's also the fact that there is not technical law that says they can't eat humans.

Characters

Main
Ron James Smith a.k.a. "RJ"
Species: Human
Height: 5'11"
Appearance: Somewhat thin, broad shoulders, not in shape but not fat either, brown hair and green eyes.
RJ is a twenty-something year old guy with a knack for computer programming and security. When he graduated, he got numerous offers in the human world to come work for them. However, he also got one from an online game publisher and developer, Tooth & Claw Gaming to protect their servers from hackers and rival companies. They offered him double the pay from what anyone else had with one catch: he had to move to the Anthro world. RJ is a nice guy who's pretty smart and resourceful but doesn't have a lot of real world experience. Moving to Furdale might be the end of him if he's not careful.

Other Characters

Tooth and Claw Gaming (RJ's workplace. Feelings about humans are typically apathetic but there are special cases)
Sabrina
Species: Wolf Anthro
Height: 8'1"
Appearance: Very heavy set, albino (white hair, white fur, and red eyes)
One of the lead graphic designers at T&C Gaming, Sabrina is creative and friendly. One of the few Anthros in all of Furdale to actually seem to like RJ. She'd never consider eating him and the friendships the two have struck up has given RJ some protection from more hostile Anthros. Wonder if RJ will ever notice how she steals glances at him from time to time.

Rhonda
Species: Gator Anthro
Height: 8'9"
Appearance: Curvaceous, grey scales/white underbelly, blue eyes
Rhonda is part of the marketing department for T&C. She's not too fond of RJ or humans in general. In public at the workplace, she tolerates him but lord forbid if she ever got him alone with no one watching...

Allison
Species: Tiger Anthro
Height: 10'1"
Appearance: Athletic build, typical tiger colors, brown eyes
Allison is head of the art department. Allison may seem friendly at first, but she's really human eater. She's tried asking RJ to lunch several different times. Luckily for him, work has called him away or Sabrina has stepped in to dissuade Allison.

Irene
Species: Bear Anthro
Height: 9'5"
Appearance: Somewhat overweight, brown fur, black hair and brown eyes
Irene is a security guard at T&C. Despite her appearance, she's pretty good at her job though rumor has it she's bent some rules before. RJ's never really had a lot contact with her outside of work, so it's unknown what she feels about him or humans.

Furdale Towers (RJ's apartment complex. He lives on the first floor. Due to work, he hasn't met everyone or been to every place in the building yet.)

Zelda
Species: Lion Anthro
Height: 9'2"
Appearance: Obese, blond fur, brown hair, brown eyes
The landlady of Furdale Towers. While reasonable, Zelda seems suspicious of RJ because he's human. She's dropped a couple hints that if she thinks he's starting trouble or gets behind on his rent, she'll eat him. RJ generally avoids her when he can.

Olivia
Species: Hawk Anthro
Height: 7'9"
Appearance: Lithe figure, red hair, brown/white feathers, gold eyes
A tenet of the first floor and a biologist. Manic and overenthusiastic, she really wants to 'study' RJ.

Jasmine
Species: Lizard Anthro
Height: 9'9"
Appearance: Muscular, black scales/yellow underbelly, green eyes
A tenet of the second floor and a body builder. Jasmine is snarky and likes to constantly tease/mock RJ due to being a 'geek'. In turn, RJ just ignores her. However, everytime he does, it seems like Jasmine just get angrier. She's a big part of why RJ has never gone past the first floor.

RULES:
1. No toilet stuff. Please.

2. Sex is allowed just don't turn this into smut.

3. Vore is allowed.

4. Don't end the story too soon.

5. Try to keep the Anthros around adult age (18 and up).

6.There can be male anthros but RJ should be interacting with females for the most part.

7.Feel free to add new Anthros.

NEW: 8. Feel free to add some other humans. Not a lot mind you, but giving RJ some new human friends or enemies, is welcome.


HAVE FUN!
